title: Our tea at the Plaza.
text: Our experience at the Plaza was magical.  Mostly because of the exemplary staff that made us feel comfortable, pampered, and very content. Shalim Khan, who waited on us, and Chef Miguel were particularly attentive and kind.  I have dietary restrictions and allergies, and they were both very accommodating.  The food was delicious, and the atmosphere was delightful.  I can’t wait to come back again.

title: Best Breakfast I’ve Ever Had
text:
This is the type of experience money can’t buy. It is worth every penny, and even more. It is an experience that is out of this world!

I have a younger brother with Autism Spectrum Disorder who is mostly nonverbal, and the staff went out of their way to attend to his every wants and needs, interact with him, and make him feel special. This right here is the reason why my family and I will be coming back as often as we can.

title: Afternoon Tea at the Plaza
text: We had the most delightful and joyous Afternoon Tea in the Palm Room. The selection of finger foods was delicious. Our guest enjoyed the stunning surroundings as well. Shalm Khan, our Server, was outstanding. Mr. Khan was attentive to detail and kind and delightful. Mr. Khan was welcoming and took great delight in our delight. Many thanks to Mr. Kahn for a wonderful Tea!

title: Good Food, Amazing Servicej
text: We went as a family of 5 for Afternoon Tea and had an amazing time. I was initially worried as one of the kids has an aversion to sandwiches, we then had an unexpected medical emergency, meaning we couldn't make our original sitting. However these fears quickly dissolved, the Palm quickly helped us reschedule with no fuss at short notice. On arrival we were quickly and professionally shown to our table, where the amazing Fariz took over. He reflects the epitome of customer service and couldn't have done any more to make us feel special. He was great with the kids and equally lovely to us (the adults). The sandwiches were nice, not great, the sweat treats and scones were very very good, the birthday surprise treats we were given were amazing. However it really was how special Fariz made us all feel that set this experience apart, without him we would have had a nice time, with him it will be a memory of a lifetime. Thank you Fariz.

title: Tea at the plaza
text: Had tea with my mom to celebrate my 3rd baby coming in a few weeks. Shalim was our server and it was excellent! Thank you!! Wonderful tea experience per usual. Beautiful tea display, service and atmosphere. Will be back for sure! Always a favorite

title: Excellent Service
text: Very pleasant, he anticipated our wants and needs. Great service. He had a great smile. We would come back again and we recommend the Plaza to anyone who is interested. Thank you for the wonderful food and amazing experience. Great experience for our last day of our trip.

title: Tea At The Plaza
text: I had tea at the plaza recently, it was very delicious. Very sweet, the sandwiches were very delicious. It is very nicely served and made. I recommend going here if you are in NYC! Fariz was a very nice server!! Also if you like tea they have very delicious tea! I personally liked the Eloise tea.

title: afternoon tea
text: i loved our server Fariz, truly a wonderful gentleman that made our experience one of a kind he was super attentive and kind and met all of our needs and exceeded our expectations. The signature plaza tea was excellent. We will be back! very expensive though

title: Amazing experience
text: The food and the service was amazing. Such a great experience. Would definitely come again. Our server Fariz made it so enjoyable and he was so kind. He was a very wonderful gentleman. So glad I got to find the time to come on my short trip to New York.

title: Lovely afternoon tea
text:
Treated my sister to afternoon tea at the plaza. We had a lovely afternoon. Our Server Kazi was very attentive and gave us the hint to mix our chosen green teas together. Together they really did taste good! Thanks for the advice  ;)
After, we got to write some postcards to commemorate the occasion.
Would definitely Recommend!

title: Incredible service and food
text: The food was incredible and the palm court server Fariz Tello was incredible probably the best server I have met. He was incredibly polite kind and kept checking everything was okay.  With out a doubt the food was amazing and the service was even better, this made my parents birthdays (the reason we went out to eat).

title: Excellent stay at an iconic hotel
text: This is a wonderful place to stay if you're visiting NYC. We have stayed here almost exclusively every time we have come to NYC since 2018. The staff goes out of their way to accommodate guests and really makes it a 5-star experience.  We have stayed at other local hotels of the same caliber and the service experience was not the same.

title: Afternoon tea
text:
We had afternoon tea at The Plaza and it was delicious. Such a lovely hotel! The Easter theme made the experience even more fun. Our server, Kazi, created Diann's Tea especially for me. Ask him about it! 
It was a highlight of our delightful day.

title: Fabulous
text: We had the best afternoon tea at Palm Court.  It started our whole NY weekend off with a bang.   Shalim was awesome and even catered to our quirky habit of having crispy fries anywhere we travel.  A must due especially if you were/are a fan of Eloise and feeling nostalgic.  ❤️

title: AMAZING!
text: this was an amazing experience, and all of the food was very good. The entire experience was amazing. The service was wonderful and it is a very good family friendly place. The atmosphere is very welcoming and absolutely stunning. I recommend!

title: Pricey but wonderful stay
text: Appreciated the real flowers. Facilities were well kept. Quiet interior court room. We heard almost no street noise. Concierge was helpful with maps and directions. Palm court was very nice for breakfast and tea. Ursula took very good care of us at the Palm court- it was a pleasure to come down for breakfast.

title: A Core Memory For Sure !
text:
My husband, daughter Eloise and I had tea at Palm Court on April 1st! The entire experience was magical. Every pastry, sandwich, scone and spread was obviously high quality and totally delicious. The tea was exquisite, ambiance of course was legendary, and the staff was exceptional. Our waiter Salim made us feel very special, calling us by name, and made a huge fuss over Eloise, who was in costume. He was kind and answered all our questions. 
It truly was a dream come true for us and our Eloise fan. 
Even if staying the night is out of reach, I highly suggest taking advantage of the incredible afternoon tea. We all deserve feeling like royalty for a day!

title: Overpriced
text:
For the cost of the room and the price of food and drink in the hotel, I consider this one of the most overrated hotels in NYC.  The lobby is nice and the room was nicer than your standard Hilton or Marriott hotel, but there was nothing that made the cost of everything worthwhile.  The elevators are a complete joke.  They only have three for the whole hotel and one was not working the whole time.  We had to take the stairs multiple times after waiting 30 minutes for an elevator.  I know NYC is expensive, but what they charge for food should be illegal.  A standard breakfast is a minimum of $30.  A glass of orange juice is $17.  There is no way breakfast for 3 people should easily break the $100 mark.
I would never spend the insane amount of money to stay there again considering there are a thousand hotels to choose from in the city that are very nice and much less expensive.

title: High tea at the Plaza is a special experience
text: Easter high tea was so much fun! We felt pampered and our server Fariz Tello was very kind and attentive. The nosh was tasty and artsy as evidenced by our photos and the teas and champagne a relaxing experience. Will definitely come back on our next trip to New York.

title: Great Service
text: Today I decided to go to Easter Afternoon Tea at the Plaza. This was such a wonderful experience and our server Fariz was incredibly kind and professional. The Food was delectable and the whole experience was magical. 10/10 would recommend him as your server and afternoon tea at the Plaza!

title: High tea on Easter Sunday
text: Had afternoon tea, and Fariz, our server, was phenomenal.  He was very attentive and friendly, really made the experience for my daughter one of a kind.  The food was excellent as well as the tea.  I’m sure we’ll remember it forever.  Thank you, Fariz!

title: Easter at the Plaza
text: Amazing service…such a special way to spend our Easter. Will gladly return and request our server,, Fariz,  for future events at the Palm Court. The food and drinks were amazing…the ambiance is stunning and the history of the building is the essence of NYC.

title: I loved it, but ny grands were underwhelmed
text:
The 'Eloise ' experience was so much fun!  My grands are 6 and 9.  They loved the sugar, the savory not so much.  Wanting them to has some protien,  we requested another set of bunny shaped bpnj, which were cheerfully delivered.  A saving grace was the Easter Bunnie for photo opps plus an bag to fill @ the Easter trolley.
Honestly,  without the added sugar of the bunny and trolly, this might have been a 'bust' for our family.  A bit to 'fancy' for my ordinary grands.

title: Great service, great experience
text:
Razi, along with the food and ambience, made our breakfast DELIGHTFUL!!!
Breakfast at the historically rich Plaza is a lovely experience. 
We had the Plaza American breakfasts and enjoyed to original landmark devour. 
We will come again when we save up some money.

title: The best hotel in NY
text:
Extremely elegant hotel, a true excellence of New York hoteleries with attention to detail, fine furnishings, flowers especially orchids everywhere.
Completely renovated rooms, impeccable services.
The catering is very good. The concierge is excellent and always ready to help you with reservations and valuable advice.
Until next time
W The Plaza

title: Easter Tea at Palm Court
text: Shalim was an absolute joy, he was extremely knowledgeable on the tea menu and knew my partners name and that it was her golden birthday! 10/10 service, very funny and accommodating. The Plaza is an institution, still as luxurious as ever. The Easter bunny was here!

title: Birthday at The Plaza
text: Shalim created an incredible birthday experience for me! The service he provided was absolutely top notch. The afternoon tea was amazing and his warmth and expertise made the event that much more amazing. Thank you Shalim for a magical day!

title: Easter Afternoon Tea
text: Easter Afternoon Tea was fabulous in every single way! Shalom Khan was a friendly, attentive and knowledgeable server who made our experience extra special! Laura the bartender made delicious drinks and was so friendly! !  We had such a wonderful time.

title: The Plaza Delivers
text: This iconic hotel was the perfect home base for our NYC vacation. It’s beautiful and elegant and our room was huge. The signature magnolia scent welcomed us in from our jaunts through the city. The location is excellent, steps from Central Park and subway lines to Times Square, Downtown and everywhere in between. For those times when our feet needed a break, taxis were at the ready to whisk us to our destination. The staff were friendly and attentive; one even gave us an impromptu peek at the ballroom space. The Champagne Bar serves the best Manhattan in Manhattan and delicious French fries. (Skip the tuna tartare; we’ve had better.)

title: Our waiter made this experience worth it
text: We loved our waiter Fariz Tello. He was incredible polite and very attentive. When I dropped my napkin he noticed and replaced it even before I realized. Then as we were leaving my Mom forgot her hat. Mr Tello ran after us and kindly returned it. He is the reason that we will be coming back here the next time we are in New York.

title: Greg & Kat’s Plaza Hotel Experience.
text:
The Plaza Hotel also known as “The Plaza” is the undisputed King of New York’s luxury hotels and universally recognized as one of the most iconic and revered destination in the world.

Located in Midtown Manhattan, New York, the Plaza is a French Renaissance inspired chateau building that was designed by noted architect, Henry J. Hardenbergh. Built & opened in 1907, the hotel possesses 282 guest rooms and also has 181 condominiums that are owned by residents.

From the beginning, the Plaza has been a symbol of distinctive glamour and luxury, and has been frequently visited by wealthy and famous guests, ranging from the Goulds, the Guggenheims, the Roosevelts, the Vanderbilts, as well as celebrity figures such as F. Scott Fitzgerald, & the Beatles. It’s also been prominently featured in numerous films such as “Arthur” (1981), “Scent Of A Woman” (1992), “Home Alone 2: Lost in New York” (1992) & Sleepless in Seattle” (1993).

Due to its rich and storied heritage, its pioneering architectural design and its status as a major New York City icon, the Plaza is listed on the U.S. National Register Of Historic Places & and has been designated as a U.S. National Historic Landmark.

In March of 2023, I brought and treated my wife and myself for a weekend stay at the Plaza and we found our time there to be absolutely outstanding. Both my wife & I were in absolute awe of the breathtaking grandeur and splendor of the hotel and particularly admired its exterior facade, it’s gorgeous 5th Avenue entrance lobby, it’s magnificent chandeliers and the immaculate marble column hallways. When stepping inside the Plaza, you really do feel as if you are entering a luxurious palace.

In addition to its stunning architecture, both my wife and I were quite impressed with the beauty and elegance of our hotel room. Our room was quite spacious and contained a very comfortable king size bed, gorgeous wooden wainscoting and furniture and a highly decorative chandelier. Our bathroom was also spacious, very well polished and outfitted with alluring floral mosaic tiles.

We found the hotel service to be first class and very accommodating. Patrick, the hotel staff member that checked us in was very friendly, welcoming and provided a smooth check in experience. He addressed all of our inquiries and helped make sure that our luggage was brought safely to our room, provided us with an additional refrigerator to store our food, and even offered us complimentary water bottles when we were leaving the hotel. We thank Patrick for his great service and for making us feel right at home.

Last, but not certainly least, my wife and I also very much enjoyed our breakfast and service at the hotel’s renowned restaurant, “The Palm Court.” Located in the center of the ground floor, the Palm Court comes with numerous sight pleasing features ranging from its palm trees, its central marble and brass bar, its sculpted female figures and its exquisite stained glass ceiling. The restaurant’s staff treated us with great kindness by addressing all of menu inquiries, offering suggestions and correctly noting our orders. I ordered and enjoyed my French toast meal while my ordered and loved her omelette meal.

In closing, my wife and I would love to thank the staff for providing us with a wonderful stay in one of the greatest and most beloved hotel in the world!!! If you’d like to be treated like a king in a destination filled with beauty and luxury, then you must definitely visit and stay at the Plaza Hotel!!!

title: Do not stay here. This hotel relies on its reputation that was set 20 to 30 years ago.
text:
Based on the perceived reputation of the brand, o was excited to stay there. Upon checking in, I soon realized that it was not going to be what I expected. The service was terrible, the building was very old, needed basic renovations, 2 of the lifts were broken throughout 80% of the stay (waited at least 10 minutes on 1 occasion) and it took between 2-4 minutes for hot water each time  in the shower

The food at both the restaurant had champagne bar was over priced and there was something wrong with each meal.

It was NOT worth the price, it has a great reputation, but I think it is now outdated and needs to reflect the current situation. It is managed by Fairmont, which I think is terrible given that I have stayed at many Fairmonts and they were so much better than this hotel.

What made the situation worse is that when the lift was reported, it was laughed off, and I said it would’ve been great if it was communicated to us, like putting a note underneath each door, so that people are aware, they just smiled, rolled their eyes and turned around. 

I have had a better stay at a Novotel and will never return to this hotel.

title: SATISFACTORY
text:
THE ROOM WAS SUPER CLEAN AND THE BED EXTREMELY COMFORTABLE. AFTER A LONG FLIGHT IT WAS MY REMEDY FOR MY TIREDNESS.
THE STAFF WAS VERY FRIENDLY AND HELPFUL. THE LOCATION WAS THE BEST FOR RESTAURANTS AND SHOPPING. I WILL RECOMMEND THE PLAZA TO FRIENDS. I GOT A TIP FROM A STAFF THAT IT WILL BE SOON RENOVATED, CANNOT WAIT TO GO BACK.

title: Closed for Covid & kept my $2000!
text: I never stayed at this hotel. I reserved a room for a special occasion during outbreak of Covid. I put down a $2000 deposit. The hotel closed for a year and I could not stay at hotel. I did not feel comfortable staying after it opened as there was still a high Covid incidence, civil unrest and a skyrocketing crime rate in NYC. When I recently went to book a room the hotel refused to allow me to use the deposit stating it had "expired." How does money that didnt cost the hotel a dime expire? The Plaza rooms are currently $1000 per night. All I was asking for was a 2 night stay for the $2000 they took from me. Ill let you decide but I certainly cannot recommend a hotel that takes my hard earned money for nothing. Remember they opted to close and canceled my reservation. The staff took my case all the way to the Director of Finance of the Plaza who refused to help. Shame on you Plaza!

title: Divine afternoon tea experience
text: The afternoon tea service at the Plaza is absolutely delightful.  The atmosphere and service are both divine.  We so appreciate Kazi J and the rest of the team for making our afternoon truly special.  Thank you so much and we will most certainly be back!

title: Kati makes the Plaza shine brighter
text: We had tea at the Palm Court to celebrate my daughter's 13th birthday. Kazi made my daughter feel like a princess! He was fabulous,  fun,  and fantastic! We loved our tea experience. The food was lovely, the atmosphere was elegant, and the tea was lovely.

title: The Palm Court
text: It was a wonderful experience the food was so yummy, the tea was to die for and the servers where the kindest ever. I came with my mother and we got the Plaza signature with the earl grey and a green tea (I don't rember the name ). I Highly recommend!!♡

title: The best 6th birthday experience!
text: He said, cut it in half came here for afternoon tea for my daughter sixth birthday and the service was absolutely amazing. My daughter had the Eloise tea, and I had the gluten-free tea which was surprisingly amazing! The sandwiches and scones were moist and not at all like some dry, gluten-free goods. Shalim made my daughter feel like the princess she is and she left saying this was the best day ever!

title: A Dream
text: We stayed at The Plaza for three nights for a NYC birthday celebration and it was the most incredible experience. Every aspect of our stay was exceptional. From our warm and welcoming check in, to the remarkable daily service and friendly faces, to the over-the-top personal attention from our butler. The Eloise suite was absolutely magical, adorned with treats and a special birthday gift. Our stay was truly a trip that memories are made of. Several of the staff went out of their way to make us feel like we were the only guest in the hotel. The birthday girl truly thought she was Eloise, running The Plaza with all of the wonderful things the staff did to make her birthday special.

title: Disappointed.
text: Food was great, rooms were nice, but the service lacked.  Bellman were hard to come by, we had to ask the front desk for help.  The service in the champagne lounge took a ridiculously long time.  2/3 elevators were broken.  I get things happen with mechanics but there’s a higher expectation with service from a Fairmont employee, especially the plaza.  Very disappointed.

title: Tea Service at the Palm Court
text: We had amazing tea service at the Palm Court.  The staff were great and able to accommodate our food allergies.  They also surprised us with a celebration cake for my sister.  They went above and beyond - will go back again next time we are in New York.

title: High Tea at its very best
text: We went for afternoon tea. It was a wonderful experience.  Kaza Jalal was a gracious host and made extra effort to ensure our experience was memorable.   The food was delicious and the environment exquisite.  It’s really a lovely venue.  Old world charm.

title: Beautifully elegant
text: Food was excellent and service was very kind and welcoming. I enjoyed each of the sandwiches the cucumber was incredible! Definitely enough food and the dessert was phenomenal. Shalim was my server and he did amazing and explained everything.

title: EXQUISITE FOOD
text:
The space is beautiful, elegant and quiet.
Spectacular food. Quality and execution.
Exquisite wagyu meat and tasty lobster.
The service at the height of the place. I highlight the head waiter, attentive, empathetic, I remember his name is Ivica.

title: Evan - in room dining!
text: Evan made our in room dining experience exceptional! The attention to detail was spot on and incredibly special. We ordered a nice meal to enjoy in before our wedding night and he came back with a fabulous bottle of champagne to enjoy! Service was top notch.

title: Evan N!
text: I can’t say enough great things about Evan!! Evan N is absolutely amazing and is making our stay so memorable and we’ve only been here for a few hours! The plaza is so lucky to have such a hard working employee who radiates positive energy… Evan you are so appreciated!

title: Iconic afternoon tea
text: We had such an amazing experience at the afternoon tea! Fariz took care of us and did everything to make my boyfriend and I feel extra special. Then we also spend like 3 more hours at the bar because the Plaza is so beautiful that you don’t want to leave. Very happy & Thank you Fariz if you read this

title: The infamous Plaza hotel
text:
Walking in, it was a big wow factor. Polite service at the main desk.
Our room looked fabulous, but on closer inspection the chairs were a bit dirty, Found the microwave in our room a bit strange, Most of the furniture was older style, big wardrobes, iron, paintings and a big tv. Nice leather inset desk and the fantastic gilded bed, with quality sheets.
The bathroom was marble and gold, very low bath, big gold mirror, good range of washing products. Shower.
The hotel has a book shop, bars and apartments. Fantastic old photos of stars who’ve stayed here on show.
The shopping mall and ballroom are incredible. Never seen anything like it.
Breakfast was in the champagne bar, we had a credit and could pay more to top it up, if we wanted more. The bacon was super crispy.
It is a one off hotel, it’s charming but a bit old fashioned. It cost a lot, over a thousand for one night, but was a celebration.

title: We Love The Plaza!
text: Staying at the plaza with our family. Second stay for my wife and I, first stay for our kids. Once again, first class all the way. Staff is amazing. Tony and Ted helped us when we arrived and Juicanna (can’t remember spelling) checked us in. They had prizes and treats for our kids since this was their first big out of town trip.  Just had tea at the palm court and our server, Shalim was wonderful and attentive. Definitely another 5 star experience in the making.

title: Sweet 16 Tea Perfection!
text: We truly had the most incredible visit to The Palm Court for High Tea to celebrate our daughter’s Sweet 16. Every member of the staff was welcoming and helpful- truly making us feel that we were VIPs. No one could match the service we received from Shalum- our table host- who went above and beyond for us to have the perfect experience. We truly appreciate the attention to detail and concierge level of service we received from the moment we arrived until we left for the day’s adventures. Thank you all for making a special day into a magical moment!

title: Afternoon Tea
text: The whole afternoon tea experience was awesome! Particularly memorable was our server, Fariz, who made sure our visit was one to remember. He was attentive, personable, and highly knowledgeable. The food and tea were great! Highly recommend.

title: Fabulous Fariz at The Palm Court
text: Fariz thank you so much for a fabulous experience! You are truly a lovely person who made my mum so welcome during our special afternoon tea. Deeply appreciate your kindness! Can't wait to return for another fabulous afternoon tea. Delicious food and lovely atmosphere.

title: An incredible afternoon tea experience
text: We booked an afternoon tea at The Plaza to celebrate my 40th Birthday and wow, what a superb experience! The service was incredible and all staff were so kind and friendly. Our main server Fariz was amazing! Fariz made the whole experience fantastic and gave us memories we’ll never forget. He was so attentive and ensured the children with us had a great experience too and went out of his way to cater for their tastes. The afternoon tea itself is by far the best we’ve ever had and the selection of teas was extensive. A highlight was the venue arranging a surprise cake and chorus of happy birthday for me. The venue itself is stunning and the whole atmosphere was brilliant. Thank you so much Fariz and all the team at The Plaza.

title: Great hotel and location Friendly staff
text: Love thé hôtel location is great and staff is very nice First time staying but my Gf and I really had a great time LGBTQ friendly one great think I felt safe around the area and I really hope that NYC keeps there charm as we used to live here in the city

title: Delicious elegance!
text: High tea at the Palm Court was welcoming, elegant, delicious and fun! The service was top notch thanks to our very attentive service person, Fariz. Creative food and the beauty of the room surpassed anything we expected. Can’t wait to return to celebrate another occasion!

title: Outstanding stay at The Plaza Hotel
text:
Myself and my sister stay at the plaza for 4 nights end of February to beginning of March. 
We absolutely loved our stay from check in-check out. 
Our room was absolutely pristine, beautiful interior with a huge bathroom. I had arranged some balloons to be in our room prior to our arrival and everything was set up perfectly. Please can I pass on a special thanks to James at the Concierge for organising this for me and for all of his communication before our stay. 

I would also like to personally thank Laoi for all of his help during our stay and for the special treat he sent us. This was so so kind and completely took us by surprise and made our stay at the plaza extra special. 

A special thanks to Waheed for all of his help with our shopping, luggage and checking up on us every time we came back into the hotel. The staff all went above and beyond for us and this makes a huge difference when choosing somewhere to stay. 
I would recommend the Plaza to anyone staying in New York and we cannot wait to return in the future. 

Laura & Kirsten

title: March 2024 Plaza Experience
text: Fantastic service and delicious food! Will absolutely visit again! Shalim is the best, he is very attentive and made sure that all of our allergies were accommodated. The Plaza’s atmosphere is phenomenal and exemplified by the service and wonderful array of options.

title: Potential to be better
text:
There's no doubting this to be a beautiful hotel. My husband and son were here in April 2023 and I just realized that I meant to leave a review but hadn't. 
We stayed in a room which was to have butler service- though we did not see or meet a butler even once. 

Upon arrival, my young son opened the bedside table drawer to which he discovered a pile of rubbish of multiple chocolate wrappers. A little disappointing.

I was also informed that I would receive a newspaper of my choice, though didn't receive a copy of the Times either. 

I also had friends who stayed here who were offered a diaper pail, though we weren't offered one. 

On a positive note, the beds were very comfortable and the crib provided was also great.

title: Praise for Palm Court
text: We had the pleasure of being served by Muhibul and Ursula for breakfast at the Palm Court. The atmosphere is delightful, the food was amazing and satisfied everyone, but the service is what really sets the Plaza apart. Many thanks to Ursula and Muhibul for making our first visit so special. They really make you feel like family. We will definitely be back and have the pineapple juice!

title: Quite an experience.
text: We had the pleasure to be attended to by a wonderful man named Shalim. Attentive, funny & overall charming.  Shalim made the entire experience of high tea feel like it was a special occasion. I cannot recommend him highly enough to all who come to the Plaza.

title: Leap year birthday celebration
text:
My birthday, February 29 comes only every 4 years & I get to celebrate it in the iconic The Plaza specifically at The Palm Court. The whole staff were superb & very courteous most especially Fariz Tello. He made us feel so special not only me but also my husband who happens to have his birthday February 28 😊. 
It’s my 2nd time here & will definitely be coming back .

title: Magical Experience
text: I recently stayed at The Plaza with my young daughter for her first trip to NYC.  I could not have imagined a more magical experience from start to end - and such a warm, welcoming, and accommodating team to welcome us.  Such an amazing stay - thank you!

title: Phenomenal customer service, great employees, fabulous service, splendid food, and overall AMAZING experience
text: Server was very very very nice and sweet. All the servers and employees were very willing and understanding with our allergies and needs and their customer service felt very personal and was phenomenal. I would highly recommend going here. You feel like royalty and it honestly feels like a dream.

title: Delectable.
text: The service was a 10/10. So was the food. Everything was absolutely exquisite. Thank you specifically to Mr. Fariz Tello, he was very attended to our concerns. I have decided that if I am ever as rich as my grandparents this hotel is where I want to spend my retired days.

title: Great experience!
text: Had a tea lunch at the palm court, it was fabulous! Everything from the service to the atmosphere was top notch! Also catered to gluten and dairy allergies, chef and waiter knew lots about allergies and were able to direct us on the menu accordingly. Will definitely be back again!

title: Tea at the Plaza
text: Shalim gave us the best experience at the Plaza for tea! I even got a free piece of cake for my birthday! The food was great and the tea stayed hot for hours! Shalim was so attentive and got us anything we needed. Will never forget this experience!

title: Afternoon Tea at the Plaza is high quali-tea
text: Shalim was the most attentive server and has a wonderful knowledge of tea! What a memorable experience!!! I highly recommend everyone stop by the plaza for tea while in NYC on their next trip. A beautiful hotel and a delicious way to spend the morning.

title: Perfect in every way!
text: The best hotel stay I have ever experienced. Beautifully appointed rooms, and the most professional hotel staff I have ever encountered. From the time you check in, to the departure, every staff member is helpful and friendly.  No request goes unmet.  What I noticed most of all is the pride in working in such a beautiful landmark in NYC.

title: Great stay!
text: Bed, pillows, comforters were all extremely soft and comfortable! I didn't want to get up! Gave us complimentary champagne, chocolate covered strawberries, bottled water, and a book on the history of the Plaza for our anniversary celebration!

title: Amazing Service
text: Upon arrival at the Plaza, we were greeted by Nick. He remembered us from a previous trip and ensured our service from the second we walked in the door. Whether it is drink service or just general knowledge about the city, Nick is the most resourceful staff member at the plaza! Highly recommend.

title: Nick, Champagne Bar
text: Nick was amazing at the champagne bar! He is the reason we will be coming back. Exceptional service, we have been many times but he makes it like home for us. It is so rare to find such detail-oriented service in the city. If you go to the champagne bar, request Nick!

title: Tourist in our town
text: My family and  I decided to be tourists in our own town (NYC).  Afternoon tea at The Plaza Hotel (Palm Court) was our destination.  Kavi, our server, was phenomenal.  He was very attentive and made sure everyone felt welcomed.  It was a great experience.

Went for the afternoon tea with my sister and our daughters. We had the loveliest experience. Not only is the space decadent - our waiter, Fariz, made sure the girls felt like princesses. It was truly a magical experience. Would definitely recommend for a special day.

title: Delicious and Delightful
text: The tea service at the Palm Court was delicious and the atmosphere was calming and beautiful! Our server Fariz was courteous, attentive, and very thoughtful. My friend was allergic to seafood and he provided substitutions for the seafood sandwiches that she loved. We absolutely would go again!!

title: Came for afternoon tea
text: Fariz was very personable and made the experience magical! I liked how he called us “my dear” and refulled the teacups without asking. He checked on us many times and was very kind. 10/10 experience with Fariz, will come again soon hopefully.

title: Extra Special
text: Had a wonderful breakfast where attentive and knowledgeable staff were there to make our experience memorable. Food was outrageous, but what our time even more special was the interactions with Kazi and Khalid. Their vast experience at The Plaza coupled with fun stories made the start of our day magical. Thank you.

title: Best place in New York
text: The service was extraordinarily good and the food was exquisite and absolutely delicious. I would definitely recommend coming here if you are in the area. The setting and quick service made it an huge pleasure to be here. Big appreciation to Fariz Tello who made the joy of my afternoon tea

title: Best experience ever
text: Amazing service and food! Khalid and his staff where amazing during my afternoon tea. The Du Hama was the best tea I’ve ever had and the pastries everything was delicious. Not to mention I didn’t have to wait to be seated nor did I ever encounter any problems.

title: Dream Weekend for Daughter's Birthday
text:
A royal weekend treat celebrating my daughter, Eloise's 11th birthday in the same named "Eloise Suite"; everything was extravagant, from the welcoming at reception to the gifts and goodies discovered in the suite upon our entry; the staff scurried around and made certain our Eloise was recognized on her special weekend; the touch of chocolaty treats, Eloise-themed luxuries and attention to detail stretched her smile beyond limits; a visit to the Plaza Boutique offered the opportunity to bring the other Eloise home to Michigan as we filled our bags with tiny keepsakes that will be cherished for years to come; and of course the Palm Court, which brought forth so many divine and flavorful dishes that left us ... happy!

An all around fantastic weekend, only too sad to see the two Eloise's part ways, but alas, until next time ... Goodbye New York!

title: Disappointing beyond words
text: What a disappointing experience at every turn. Even from making the reservation and fighting to get someone on the phone to book the home alone package. This place is very special to us as we got married here. We had been so excited to take our kids here even though we live in NYC. We booked the home alone package as our kids live the movie. We called the concierge to ask for special amenities to be in the room on arrival. He told us that the in room dining department would call us as they handle this. They never called despite many calls and emails by us. We had arranged for the ice cream sundae from the movie which was part of the package to be in the room upon check in. When we checked in they told us they cancelled the order because they didn't know when the room would be ready. One of our rooms wasn't ready until 5pm on a one night stay. When the sundae did finally come it was wrong and had to be remade. We never received any amenities at all. Then ono ur check out day it took 35 minutes for the bellman to come and 20 minutes to wait for the elevator. When we finally got to the breakfast we were told it was closed. The manager of the palm court was not nice at all. The entire experience was lackluster. No one at all enjoys their job or has any pride at all. The property is coasting. It was upsetting to see. This hotel is in desperate need of new management.

title: Fantastic hotel but a few little extras would go a long way.
text: There is no question that this hotel is famous for good reason as it is spectacular from floor to ceiling.  We didn’t have a great experience with our check in, our bill was incorrect with over €5000 being overcharged initially and the room didn’t really live up to our expectations in relation to the service provided (eg I think the ‘butler’ advertised with our room type must have been off that week).  It wouldn’t put us off staying again but did taint the visit a little.  The concierge service is outstanding and nothing was too much trouble for the team.  Some of the champagne bar team were wonderful, some looked like they were a little tired of the clientele’s expectations (e.g not waiting 10 minutes before someone notices you are there).  It’s a great location right by Central Park and the great shopping on fifth avenue.  The cleanliness of the hotel is very good and the room (Carnegie) was very nice.

title: Wonderful
text: Always fun time at the restaurant. The staff is always so friendly and accommodating. We have a place in the city but we put family members here while they are visiting. We have also stayed over ourselves in the past here a few times and it’s hands down great.

title: Customer service here knows no bounds!
text: My son and I traveled to The Plaza for a quick trip before school started back. It’s not hyperbole when I tell you there is no greater experience than staying at The Plaza!  Daniel Brigano and his entire Guest Experience team made our overnight stay completely unforgettable!  I loved it so much I stopped by to say to Daniel on a recent trip to NYC and he was just as hospitable!!

title: Love the Guest Experience Team!
text: Daniel Brigano, Guest Experience Manager, went above and beyond to make sure our time at The Plaza was memorable!  He greeted us by name, hosted us for a drink in the champagne bar, gave us a behind the scenes look at the Ballroom and told us stories of events that have taken place there!  Daniel and his team always provide second to none service.

title: The Plaza Tea
text: A lovely decadent place to go for tea. The cucumber sandwiches are excellent. The desserts? Fabulous. I love a place where you can have a strong breakfast cocktail without judgement. We lover our server-  Fariz is a gem. 10/10 great place to go.

title: Scam at the Bar in the Palm Restaurant
text: Keep an eye on your bill and the somewhat surly bartender in the lobby Palm Restaurant. Sat there to enjoy a cocktail. When the bill arrived in the leather folder, there was a bill showing the total along with the usual blank space for a tip. Immediately underneath it was a second copy of the same bill, also with a space for a tip - one copy the merchant copy and the second the customer copy, per usual. I filled both out, adding a generous tip and taking the customer copy for my wallet. After doing so I noticed a third bill underneath the first two. It showed that within the total on the first two bills was an 18% gratuity already added. As a result our bartender received approximately a 40% gratuity for at best average service. Hard to imagine the placement of the three bills was accidental.

title: Wonderful days of celebrating friendship at the Plaza
text: A bit over 4 years after our last visit at this magical place we returned for a trip with close friends. In my last review I already stated that we were so happy next to staying at this wonderful place to have met so many wonderful people in this hotel. The staff is really outstanding so the biggest joy was to see so many „friends“ again still being part of The Plazas Legacy. From Freddy and the whole crew outside, Nick and the bar team, the warm welcome at the desk to our most loved crew at the outstanding breakfast. My friends and I will always remember the hours well spent talking about life while having fresh juice, cappuccino and the delicious food. For me personally it was pure joy seeing Porfirio again, who already connected deeply with us during our last visit with my wife. Kazi, Mulhibul (I hope I spelled it correctly) and the whole team in charge provided us with outstanding hospitality. The rooms once again were amazing (so much love in the details), and of course the amazing bathrooms you just not want to leave…The energy of this place is absolutely special. We hope to see you again soon team and thank you for another wonderful wonderful stay.

title: Afternoon Tea at the Plaza
text: Had a great time at the palm court for afternoon tea with my family… Shalim Khan our server made the experience unforgettable! The food was amazing, especially the macarons with caviar. The service was great as well. We felt taken care of and would come back soon!

title: best service
text: Shalim provided excellent service. he made our experience amazing !!! Made sure to take care of all our requests. He is the best !!! We will definitely come back and do this experience again. was very attentive and made sure to check about dietary restrictions.

title: Beautiful. Excellent location. Unorganized
text: Excellent structure, very well located, services are of high quality, however the part that requires staff organization and labor is confusing and leaves something to be desired. Service needs to improve with the addition of a minimum of cordiality. And the housekeeping service was also disorganized, they even forgot to tidy up one of the rooms during our stay. Lack of training and preparation of the workforce

title: Afternoon Tea at the Royal Palm Court
text:
Delicious Tea!! Beautiful environment, enriching and luxurious.  Prompt service and great communication, truly a treat to enjoy.  

Would recommend for couples or business. Shalim us delightful and courteous, a great host for delightful lunch

title: Beautiful hotel however needs
text: Hotel was well located and everything was a short walk away. 1/10 and that’s only because of the location. Would give it a 10 however I had a terrible experience on my first night with the bathtub water being brown and the handle falling off leaving the water running. Didn’t go to sleep until 3am bc of the noise. Didn’t even offer restaurant vouchers or comp room service or anything for the huge inconvenience. Would have left satisfied if the team put an effort to makeup for the bad experience but they didn’t even try. Terrible first night

title: Excellent Tea Service
text: The afternoon tea was wonderful.  We had an excellent server named Shalim Khan. He was very witty and attentive, extremely helpful and willing to take pictures. The highlight was the glasses from Alaska! I highly recommend dining at Palm Court at The Plaza.

title: The best hotel service!
text: The service at this hotel is outstanding. The bellmen and in room dining servers go above and beyond to make your stay the best it can be. If you order room service, be sure to ask for Babul for the best service & experience! Thank you Babul for the sundae and chocolate covered strawberries! You made our last night unforgettable!!!! Also, Ted and Kevin at the front door are amazing. If you go to the Palm Court bar, be sure to ask for Russel!

title: The Plaza Tea is worth it!
text: First time stay at the Plaza hotel and it did not disappoint.  We loved our room and the hotel was beautifully decorated for Valentine’s Day.  We attended afternoon tea.  Shamim Khan was a wonderful waiter.  He made our entire experience fabulous!

title: Yes at the Palm Court
text: The service at the Palm Court for tea was so lovely. The staff treated my daughter who was getting the Eloise tea so sweetly and made her feel so special. It was such a wonderful experience because of the servers and hostesses. Will return soon!

title: Tourist Trap
text: Lots of unexpected charges. $65 “urban experience” fee. They said I would get $50 to use at the hotel per day. Used on snacks in the room, then they told me that wasn’t covered as we were checking out. Ordered the Kevin Sunday for my kids. 3 of the smallest scoops of ice cream I’ve ever seen for $36 then they charged $12 “delivery fee” to deliver it to the room. Keys didn’t work on check-in. Had to make 4 trips to the lobby to get it straightened out. Dingy rooms. Nothing great about the hotel. Didn’t even have coffee maker in the room. If you want to waste your money, stay here. Otherwise, smart travelers will go elsewhere.

title: Movie aperitif
text: Aperitif booked at the Garden Court, wonderful location, impeccable service, very pleasant atmosphere, frequented by New Yorkers, mostly. We then immersed ourselves in their reality, a truly positive experience. To be repeated and recommended! You can book from Italy, and, incredible to say, it is the only place in New York where, in the bill, the recommended tips are not indicated, IN fact, it is specified that it is already included!!!

title: Galentines High Tea!
text: We had a lovely time at the Palm Court!! I was able to get a vegan option of the afternoon tea and everything was beautifully made and delicious. Our server Shalim was also so accommodating, friendly and helpful! We will definitely be back soon!

title: Service here was incredible🤩
text: I’ve only been here 1 night so far and the service has been incredible we came down to Breakfast and a lovely man named Kazi was our waiter he is so lovely and helpful, taking our photo bringing me a birthday cake (at breakfast!) and just a really great person. Thank you!

title: People are exceptional.  Elevators not so much
text: Khalid Chowdhury was brilliant the first day, but when he remembered everyone and what they ordered on subsequent days, we were blown away.   It’s been a few years since we were last at The Plaza, but Khalid is The Plaza service memory.   We loved our stay, except for your elevators.  Very disappointing elevators.

title: An Experience you must try!
text: From the moment my wife and I entered we were greeted by Neil who kindly took our bags and welcomed us. Everything was very elegant and the staff were smiling and welcoming. Our room was clean and loved the bathroom and soaking tub. I truly believe the plaza puts there clients first and will always look to make your stay wonderful. Thank you to Justin Milazzo for reaching out AFTER our stay to ask me about my experience. He’s truly professional and we are already planning our trip back for next year!

title: Absolutely lovely!
text: Kabir was amazing and so accommodating!  Just a lovely experience!!!! He made our experience so special!!! This is the first time for  my mother in laws birthday and my college roommates. They had an outstanding experience!!! I would highly recommend!

title: Stunning hotel and superb customer service!
text:
Stunning hotel and the most amazing customer service. We stayed for one night in December 2023 and left very early which meant my daughter left her teddy behind. We only realised when we arrived back in the UK.
The staff went above and beyond to find this bear which she has had more over 10 years. They emailed me some photos of all the places the bear had been and mailed him back to her. Amazing..

title: High tea at the plaza
text: The most incredible and attentive service!!  Can’t wait to come back ! What an special day celebrating my birthday. The food was delicious, tea was incredible. I am so happy with everything at the plaza and brings back so many memories of my childhood

title: Spilling the Tea
text: Fariz Tello was amazing! Service was 10/10, made for a very special part of my mom’s visit to the city. Every part of the food was delicious, and the tea was piping hot! Will definitely be returning for another special occasion. A must do if you are visiting NYC and want a luxury afternoon tea experience.

title: Fariz and the tea service were top notch
text:
Fariz provided the most lovely service for me and my family! He truly made our visit so special. Was attentive, provided great recommendations, and absolutely charming.  He even took a photo for us! 

The sandwiches and tea were delicious as well. We cannot wait to come back 💗

title: Afternoon tea is spectacular!!!
text: Afternoon tea is spectacular! The food absolutely delicious and presented with such care. Just as impressive is the service. We had Fariz as our server and he was the most kind, gentlemanly, and professional server I’ve ever had. It’s an expensive but amazing experience.

title: Great experience
text: Great high tea experience at the Plaza. We were especially grateful to have Fariz as our attendant who was very attentive and helpful. Will definitely come again and highly recommend to anyone who comes to NY. It is so beautifully situated.

title: THE PLAZA EXPERIENCE!
text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVED MY STAY AT THE PLAZA! I wish I could live there! From the front of the building, with its picturesque red carpet, to the beautiful, gold trims and antique touch in the rooms-everything was perfect. The greatest of shout outs to NATASHA. She was the most professional, sweetest, and detail oriented person I’ve ever encountered in a hotel. I went for my birthday, to have the PLAZA experience, and that she gave me! Everyday I was greeted with such warmth, and surprised with little tokens left in the room. Thank you so much Natasha for making my birthday the best one yet!!!!!! I have recommended the hotel and her to everyone who’s asked!! Please give her my praise!

title: Disappointed at The Plaza
text: To say our stay was lackluster would be a polite way to say it. Everything was a complete disappointment, from the lack of good and knowledgeable staff to an uncaring attitude. Let me just start at the beginning. Upon check in I asked if there was an ATM in the hotel and we were told YES there was, but it was located in the spa which was closed. Since I was going to the spa in the morning, I was content to wait. Upon my arrival in the spa, no ATM. An encounter with a bellman in the elevator confirmed there was no ATM in the hotel. That same morning my Fiancé went to the front desk to request a newspaper and was told there were not any and they must be requested in advance. Understandable so he did just that for the following morning. The next morning we leave for a quick walk to grab a coffee, no newspaper. Stop at the front desk to inquire, and we are told his request from the day before was not properly entered into the system. I was not pleased and chose to walk away and return to the room to get ready for the day. Now let me start on the room. Our hot water was almost non existent in the bathtub, bathroom sink and shower. The climate control in the room did not work and it was like a sauna in there. The bed and pillows were hard as rocks and quite frankly the most uncomfortable we have ever slept in at a 5 star hotel. It has been 7 years since I had the pleasure to stay at the Plaza and I can tell you it is no the same. I have never stayed anywhere else in the city and I will never return after this stay. There are way too many options in this amazing city to spend a fortune on bad service, rooms that have zero comfort and offer much to be desired. My only compliment goes to Maria at the spa, who gave me one of the best massages I have ever had.

title: Everything I hoped for
text: The Plaza is a timelessly classic hotel that is incredibly beautiful.  They offer excellent amenities, the rooms are beautiful and the beds are really comfortable.  I want to model my master bathroom like theirs!  The staff at the hotel were all extremely helpful, friendly and efficient. We had an amazing time!

title: Amazing Hotel
text: The hotel is absolutely Gorgeous!! Our room and the mosaic tile bathroom was very spacious and beautifully decorated. We had a fabulous stay!! The staff was very friendly and welcoming. We were there for a wedding and everything was  fabulous. The Plaza is everything you would expect in Luxury Hotel

title: Afternoon tea at Palm Court
text: Dovid and Shalim had some amazing expert knowledge of the food and history of the hotel. Palm court is a must if you experiencing the Plaza hotel. The food is exceptional and an amazing tea selection they provide to the guests. They provided an amazing birthday surprise for my girlfriend!

title: Amazing Tea with Kazi Jalal as our server.
text: Kazi Jalal was amazing! He made our tea experience great. Great to know that there is still hard workers in the service industry. He also made sure that we had great pictures from different angles. Definitely coming back soon thanks to Kazi!

title: The most special hotel in the entire New York City!
text: Staff is competent and friendly. Ted from the Bell Desk went above and beyond with such great energy. Property feels classy and immaculate the moment you walk in. We stayed in the Tower room and loved it. Based on other reviews, we did not try the breakfast nor the afternoon tea. You do receive a $50 food credit per day which can be used at any of the dining places in the hotel.

title: Really wonderful team at the Palm Court
text: Really wonderful service. Thank you to Khalid and the whole team for providing a wonderful birthday experience for me and my daughter! Quick, responsive, thoughtful, friendly and very professional. Everyone was super kind and well informed about the menu and offerings. 10 out of 10!

title: Amazing service from Kazi at The Plaza
text: Just had High Tea at Palm Court at The Plaza. We have had the most wonderful experience thanks to the fantastic Kazi Jalal who took care of us. The tea he recommended was amazing and aromatic, the food was great and Kazi even gave us postcards to fill up to send to our loved ones. Kazi is incredible and made our first experience at The Plaza absolutely amazing. We can't wait to come back

title: Afternoon tea
text: We came to the plaza for afternoon tea and had the signature tea experience. It was wonderful tome especially because of the manager Ashleign and Kabin. They took excellent care of us and really elevated the experience. We will definitely come back!

title: Best high tea!
text: Kabir and Ashleign are the best! They are extremely welcoming and informative! The plaza itself is absolutely stunning, I highly recommend the afternoon tea - specificslly the plaza signature tea. We will be coming back and toasting another event here!

title: Wonderful experience at the Palm Court - Thank you Shalim!
text: Shalim Khan at the Palm Court was wonderful and made our experience so enjoyable! He was so kind, attentive and thoughtful! It was our first time here and  he made my daughter feel very special and comfortable! Thank You Shalim for everything!

title: Good location and a nice big room but zero on service.
text:
The hotel has a good location, is clean and has a great history. And there is the odd staff member, like Vanessa (front desk) and Paul (luggage) who tried.
Other than that - zero service! 

Our welcome was equal to a 2 star motel. We were not made to feel welcome (but at the same time, the front desk person was not rude) and I'm pretty sure in the 3 days I didn't get a smile, a 'hello' or a 'can I help you'. Nothing. 
I've stayed in suites before that offer butlers. They normally greet you and check in on a regular basis if there's anything needed. I even feel awkward and decline when they kindly offer to pack or unpack for you. 
We didn't even see the butler that was advertised and at $1250 a night I expected more if I'm honest. 
The room was a good size. Quiet but zero view. It also was a bit sparse. 

The whole experience left me underwhelmed and one I couldn't recommend. I also would not stay there again which is sad because I got the distinct impression the hotel part of the building is dying a death. 

There was a few other hotels on my list when I was choosing; most I'd stayed in overseas so knew the excellent service. We went into one that was on my shortlist for a drink and I was greeted in the way I would expect the Fairmont to - well done the Langham for setting the standard. Maybe the staff at the Fairmont could nip in to see what it's like to offer a cheerful (free!) smile and hello.

title: Superb
text:
Everything is 5 star at The Plaza.
 It’s a hotel that everyone needs to experience at least once in their life…
Customer service is top notch, from housekeeping to front desk to front door to waiter at the restaurant to bell man.  Doesn’t get any better than here.
Book now and you’ll thank me later, I promise!

title: Great stay at the Plaza
text: Delighted to share that my stay at the Plaza Hotel was exceptional! The suite was not only beautiful but also spacious and incredibly comfortable. A perfect blend of luxury and comfort for a memorable experience. Highly recommended! Would love to be back soon!

title: Underwhelmed
text: We were so excited to stay at the Plaza for my two daughters' first trip to NYC with my mom and I. We found the staff to be aloof and unresponsive and were very disappointed in the hotel. It's pretty and has a wonderful reputation, but we didn't even have anyone show us to our room or have a bellman willing to bring our bags up for us. After waiting in the room for a while on our first night, I went down to the lobby only to find our entire luggage rack still sitting by the reception desk. I brought it up on my own so we could get to dinner. The concierge was always friendly, but the rest of the staff was smug and boring. We had to bring our bags down without a luggage rack for our departure because the bell staff brought up a luggage stand for the room instead of a luggage cart for transport. It was such a disappointing experience. At least give guests a warm welcome and a glass of champagne upon arrival for that rate.

title: Great birthday tea time
text: Amazing experience and delicious food. It was surprisingly filling with so much variety in the food. The oolong tea was smooth and perfectly brewed. Perfect for me and my friend’s thirtieth birthday celebration. Thank you Fariz for the great service!

title: Amazing!
text: The most amazing tea time celebration !! My friend and I had the best time celebrating our thirtieth birthdays :) Fariz was truly the nicest and most thoughtful  waiter and made our experience so special and memorable! Can’t wait to come back again soon :)

title: Great Birthday Afternoon Tea Time
text: Great experience at the Plaza with Khalid & Fariz ! They even sang me happy birthday and offered to take our picture. The sandwiches were delicious and our tea cups were always filled promptly. Would recommend tea at the Plaza for a special occasion.

title: Tea at the Plaza is a must do!
text: Tea at the Plaza was the highlight of our trip to NYC.  Khalid was the absolute BEST!!! he made our experience memorable and special.  This is a must do if you are planning a trip and request Khalid!!!

title: Wonderful experience!
text: Our Christmas trip to NYC was highlighted by High Tea at the Plaza! Fabriz, our waiter, gave us excellent service and added to the opulent experience. The patisserie were unique- each one a flavor combination with beautiful presentation.  The atmosphere was festive with sparkling Christmas trees.  Reserve in advance.

title: Wonderful staff experience.
text: Both Fariz and Babu were so welcoming and  warm.  They remembered us from past visits a while ago- so nice. They truly made us want to come back- which we will soon as we live nearby! Would highly recommend afternoon tea for a special treat while in NYC.

title: Tea Time with family
text: Faliz was the best waiter. All the staff were friendly and accommodating. Gluten free options amazing!! Tea was delicious! Definitely worth the $. Tea at the Plaza is an experience you shouldn’t miss. Then a walk in the park. Enjoy!!!!!!!!

title: First of many more visits!
text: Fariz was SO nice! He treated us like queens, and we could not be happier with our first high tea experience at the Plaza! It was my mother in law’s birthday and he came and brought her a chocolate mouse cake. We are definitely coming back ❤️❤️❤️

title: Julia’s Bridal Extravaganza
text: Fariz gives the best service. He was so welcoming and provided a positive experience for us all! The small bites are incredible. I highly recommend the Bellini! Such a beautiful and special place to spend with ones you love. Thank you!!!!!!

title: An excellent NYC stay !
text: In indictment was fantastic. The suite was also amazing and the housekeeping was extremely attentive. Beds were comfortable, and everything was spotless.  Bathroom was beautiful. Babul was our server and he was extremely friendly everyday for room service — our 5 year old son loved him. He absolutely made our stay better. We will be back very soon!

title: I am glad I went to Plaza.Will I return?Maybe.
text:
A great hotel.
However, their Champagne Bar for breakfast was a huge disappointment.
State if art room.
Great bathroom.
Great restaurant.
I loved the ambience; the entrance is lije a museum.
However, the ser people sometimes have a wrong attitude…
A but of snobbery.

title: Girls weekend
text: My cousins and I stayed at The Plaza for a girls weekend. Overall experience was 10/10. The staff were helpful and kind, the room was beautiful with comfortable beds and pillows and we were so happy to create memories together.

title: Warmest meal in Cold January
text:
We had high tea at the Palm Court. Fariz was our server. He was absolutely incredible. He has a heart of gold. My friend is visiting, and he does not eat desserts because of his allergies. Fariz was super sweet to accommodate that for us, and give us two rows of savory treats instead of Dessert that would  have not been consumed. Service was stellar! Everyone was warm, and hospital, would highly recommend. 
The sandwiches are absolutely delicious. Each one is explosion of flavors. The chefs bring together an amalgamation of savory and tart and fat and acid all in each bite.

title: Tea at Palm Court
text: Afternoon tea at the Palm court was such a wonderful experience. Great service, beautiful atmosphere, and delicious scones and pastries! Shalim, our server made my daughter’s birthday so special by bringing out a piece of chocolate mousse cake and singing to her!

title: High tea with my parents - great!
text: Excellent afternoon high tea with Fariz! I brought my parents and they loved it. The dining room is formal yet bright and casual, and the tea treats were so yummy and different from each other. Our waiter Fariz was so kind and helpful- he really made the experience more memorable. Thank you for the great time.

title: Expensive, but worth it
text: A wonderful bucket list experience. While the surroundings are indeed amazing, that really is what you pay for. The sandwich’s and desserts  were outstanding but such tiny portions. I am willing to overlook this to say I finally had afternoon tea at the Plaza hotel. Porfirio was a wonderful server, I’d be happy to see him should I visit again.

title: Spilling the tea about afternoon tea
text: Fariz was absolutely amazing. Always attentive to our needs. We were served delicious tea. About 20 different teas to choose from. I choose the tropical tea. It was delicious. The fingers were delightful. The only one I didn't like was the caviar macron

title: Exceptional Meal
text: The service and food was amazing- we highly recommend Fariz Tello. He is wonderful and very kind. We really loved the mango coconut tart- it was very delicious and sweet, and it was also very tangy. It was a great experience and I would love to come again.

title: Amazing experience at the Palm Court
text: We had a wonderful time at the Palm Court for high tea. We took our two children, 7 and 10, and our server Fariz was amazing, going above and beyond to make it a magical experience for all. Highly recommend!

title: The best service and hospitality!
text: Our waiter Fariz was amazing and showed top tier hospitality. The service was amazing and we felt very special and valued :) definitely coming back. It was such a treat! I reccomend this place to anyone! Definitely got the bang for the buck :)

title: Fantastic Tea, Stellar Service
text:
The Palm Court tea at the Plaza is pricey but very worth it. It's absolutely lovely location and the transition in the evening makes it more magical. The tea was fragrant and delicious. My partner is celiac and they were incredibly attentive, never felt rushed, and the gluten free food was tasty with variety. 
The service was impeccable. Warm without being intrusive, friendly, attentive, and an absolute delight. Ask for Fariz Tello to attend your table.  100 stars for him. 

I am definitely coming back and bringing my friends here.

title: Amazing service from Fariz and FANTASTIC gluten free menu
text: Amazing tea! The service was extraordinary (Ask for Fariz- the kindest and most welcoming server I've ever had!) The gluten free tea was amazing and I didn't feel like I was missing out on anything even though my partner had regular tea!

title: Amazing Experience at The Plaza for Tea!
text: Our daughters took us to The Plaza for afternoon tea. We had an amazing experience! Our waiter, Ferize was so informative and so incredibly kind. He actually made the experience. He made the experience very so fabulous for our daughters. Provided extra champagne. Had us try a special tea "on the  house". Had us sing Happy  Birthday to Eloise with a special cake and candle!! He made us feel so comfortable. Fabulous experience because of Ferize!!

title: Excellent service
text: Our experience at the Palm Court for afternoon tea was fabulous because of the service provided by our server, Fariz. He was incredibly attentive, provided excellent recommendations and when he heard we were treated our mothers to tea, made them feel incredibly special. The food and tea was delicious but the experience was truly made by the service provided by Fariz.

title: Afternoon Tea at the Plaza
text: expensive but worth it. one  of a kind ambiance, amazing food, perfect tea, excellent champagne…the best part of the experience was our server Fariz who was so attentive and friendly. will be back to the Plaza for tea as soon as possible! i love new york

title: A delightful Afternoon Tea at The Plaza
text: I attended the Afternoon Tea at the Plaza Hotel with my 3 daughters. We were served in the Palm Court and the service was impeccable. Fariz went out of his way to ensure that the 4 of us had a delightful experience. We appreciate the attention to every detail. I would recommend this experience.

title: Tea time
text: We had afternoon tea at the Plaza Hotel. Porfirio Cortes was a wonderful waiter. Made our afternoon tea very so enjoyable. The Chai tea was delicious. Beautiful hotel and must do in NYC. In a beautiful location near Central Park. Even walking around the hotel was nice.

title: Not worth the $$$
text: Let me preface this by saying that I think everyone should experience the Plaza if they can. HOWEVER, I’m glad I had hotel points for this stay and did not use my own money. It would not have been worth it. The room was luxurious, and the butler/housekeeping service was excellent, but there were a lot of things wrong with our stay. First off, we had to check in late. They didn’t have our room ready on time, which was disappointing. Second, the room service (mind you for 2 people cost upwards of $120 for one meal) was served cold. It was not up to par with the food that I thought would be served. Third, when we left, I was not given my full deposit back. I was told when I called to verify that I was being charged for a meal that we did not order. All in all, it’s a nice hotel that’s run and treated like a Holiday Inn. It’s only expensive because it’s famous. Oh, and don’t plan on having a lot of drinks at the bar. 2 drinks was $60!!!!! Won’t stay again.

title: AMAZING time at the Champagne Bar!
text: Nick and Russell are the BEST. What an amazing time at the champagne bar. The hospitality was second to none. They made us feel welcome and at home, even though we were just visiting from the street. We will never forget this experience.

title: Not good afternoon tea experience
text: Only reason for stars was fantastic server Fariz Tello and some food and  tea delicious. After being told they could accommodate food allergies upon making reservations, it was impossible to speak to anyone prior being told the server would handle. When arriving 1:00, it became apparent the whole dining room had same time. All servers had to take orders and get to the assembly line kitchen at the same time. The server said the kitchen would accommodate my allergies. I was served sandwiches appropriate for a kindergartner. And others at the table shorted their choices. If I could have had an appropriate conversation with someone prior, we all could have had a lovely lunch.

title: Fabulous Tea Experience at the Plaza
text: I took my mother for her 79th birthday and my daughter to the plaza for tea. It was a fabulous experience. Fariz Tello’s service was amazing and he made my mother feel so special as we celebrated her birthday. It was the perfect setting for a special occasion.

title: happy new year!
text:
A first time afternoon tea at the plaza was a HIT! And on NYE of all days. Shalim was so attentive and helpful with everything that was served, and great at making suggestions of what tea we should try! 

Highly recommend for any special occasion. 

The ambiance is worth it alone, but the food and tea are also EXQUISITE! 

Cannot wait to go back again.

title: Don’t have the High Tea at The Plaza.
text:
AVOID the high tea at all costs.  Unless a tower of stale, low quality cakes and  sandwiches for $692 is your thing (family of 4) , then go right ahead.   Chef came out and checked the sandwiches, said they were fine, but brought out a bunch more stale sandwiches anyway.    Only ~10% of the items were edible,  and they didn’t comp anything except a single coke.

I very rarely review experiences on TripAdvisor,  happy to take the good with bad when traveling,  but felt I couldn’t let this Iet this pass without comment - as it felt like a huge grift.

title: Tea at the plaza
text: Tea at the plaza was simply divine. The delicacies of snacks and the delicious tea was wonderful. Our waiter, Porfirio, was most kind and gave us a very unique experience with his genuine care. My daughter and niece even enjoyed a special birthday treat. We thoroughly enjoy our time together.

title: Excellent Service
text: Excellent service, delicious food at The Plaza New York.. Beautiful room, though scones could be larger.. Highly recommend reservations during holidays. Had a delightful day with my best friend. Will surely go back!

title: A nice birthday experience
text:
The stay was very nice but the things mentioned below were disappointing for the price we paid
We called down for bellhop at approximately 11:15am 
Waheed arrived and brought our bags down. We never received a ticket for baggage claim 
We checked out gave in our parking ticket at approximately 12:15, took a brief walk in the park and came back. Our vehicle wasn’t pulled up yet so Ericka styles was called down to assist. 
After 15 minutes she helped us get our own bags and we walked them outside to the curb
Kevin then helped us and said our vehicle was on the corner of 58th in which is was not 
He proceeded to walk us to the garage where the cars were parked. Kevin called someone and it was then reported our car was now in front of the hotel 
Kevin was of great assistance and finally got in our vehicle at approximately 1:30. Having to get your own bag and walk around to find your car is not valet service 

The shower gel in room 822 was empty 
The fully stocked refrigerator was nice but it would be cool to have an empty one for personal 
When we checked in there were a lot of food carts/trays in the hallway. The hallways should be cleared more often

title: Afternoon tea
text: Service was excellent.  Food was very good.  I wish the scones were larger. Room was beautiful.  Highly recommend making a reservation well in advance around the holidays.  A fun day spent with my best friend.  Happy new year.

title: Fun time at the Plaza

title: Lovely pre Christmas experience

     I asked for mint tea rather than Earl Grey but was told that it wasn’t available. Unusual not to be offended a choice.

title: A very tired and sad hotel.
text:
The Plaza has iconic status in New York and therefore doesn't have to try very hard to attract guests.
Unfortunately the hotel owners have taken full advantage of that reputation and stopped trying many years ago and as a result the Plaza is extremely dated. Fixtures, fittings, decor and general upkeep have not been attended to for decades and the absence of any investment and there being no desire to deliver a quality experience is both obvious and shocking.
It is a very tired and sad place that without its historic name would struggle to achieve even a 4 star rating.
If it's on your bucket list then stay one night, experience the frayed carpets, the doors that don't fit properly, the waiting room that masquerades as  a tea room, the 19th century fittings and then move to a quality hotel where you will be appreciated.

title: The Plaza: Not what it used to be…
text: I have been coming to New York for years at Christmas and have always enjoyed the Plaza, but this year was different.  The hotel was roped off and they were only letting a certain amount of people in. When we said we were there to visit the Eloise store for my daughter’s birthday we were told to go around the side of the building, which we did. We went in and were immensely disappointed at the lack of Eloise display. What used to be a precious store with much to do is no relegated to a corner of a tiny store with a rude woman only allowing a few people in at a time. When I asked her what happened to the Eloise store she just shrugged and said “Covid. At least you have this.” Eloise is a staple of the Plaza and was such a fun experience. I understand Covid hit the hospitality industry hard, but it seems taking away something that draws tourists and money is a bad business plan. Also, the food hall is closed. After being let down at the shop and food hall, we needed to use the restroom and were let into the main hotel by an employee (to the front where we were previously told we couldn’t go). Not sure why the front entrance is closed but the side is open? Any way, it was disappointing to see such an icon of an establishment lose so much of the magic that made it so special.

title: Outstanding service provided by Khalid Chowdhury!  Made our mother daughter tea extra special with his attentiveness!

title: Amazing one of a kind experience.
text: Amazing, service was spectacular. Fariz was great. He took such good care of us and made our experience special and one of a kind. Highly recommend. Food was delicious. The scones excellent. The perfect Christmas treat for friends.

title: A sour taste
text: This is a review of afternoon tea at the Plaza hotel NYC. Please don’t waste your money at this hotel. The whole hotel has an awful attitude problem which started on arrival at the front door being refused entry and asked to prove that I had a reservation. I first took afternoon tea at this hotel four years ago and had a pleasant experience. This time however I felt cheated and frankly robbed of my hard earned cash. My issue is with the service received. The waiter didn’t explain the sandwiches or cakes, we were not approached during the meal and asked if everything was ok. There was no pleasantries or customer engagement. In top London hotels you are offered additional sandwiches and cakes and the jam and cream can be topped up if required, sadly not at the Plaza you get what you are given, no more. Taking afternoon tea is a ritual experiencing different teas and flavours with each course, sadly not at the Plaza, you are allowed one tea choice which is not replenished during the meal. The ambiance of the Palm Court has been neglected over the years, they have added a noisy bar area in the middle of the restaurant which was frequented by hotel guests and their luggage plus frequent use of profanities. The decor is tired and so are the staff who just went through the motions of welcoming their guests. Most noticeable is the attitude of the management, we knew it was going to be expensive but when we offered our opinion of our experience and sought some redress through a reduction of the service charge we were ignored and refused any offer of recognition of our concerns. London hotels know how to treat their guests, this American rabble don’t have a clue about service and don’t care either. Very nearly $400 for a poor experience and a nasty  exchange of views with an arrogant, unprofessional and uncompromising restaurant manager left a sour taste to what should have been an uplifting and enjoyable experience. This arrogant brutish hotel and it’s staff have a lot to learn. Spend your money elsewhere.

title: Hightea at the plaza

title: Run along now, we don't want any trouble from the likes of you!

title: Excellent
