text: We had a wonderful experience at afternoon tea. It was because of the fantastic service provided by Kazi J. He was very helpful and friendly! He offered suggestions, helped with photo taking, and was very attentive. We will be back!

title: Epic experience felt the joy of the season
text: My experience with Fariz Tello  was above and beyond my expectations, he was attentive charming and very experienced in the service which  I expected from The Plaza.. he deserves great rewards and recognition I had the pleasure of meeting the manager as well George, he was kind a great listener and asked about our experience in the Tea Room. Overall by far Farez has been one of the best servers I have meet globally.

title: Had a great time
text: I had a great time at the palm court the staff is so nice, especially Fariz tello, his service was above and beyond. And the manager George was so personable and kind to his guests. Thank you plaza  hotel for this experience

title: Palm Court Tea Time with Fariz
text: My cousin was visiting from out of town with her 2 young daughters. We came to the Plaza for tea time in Palm Court. Fariz was our server and he made it the most special experience. He was the most attentive and kind hearted server we have ever had! The food and tea was delicious and the atmosphere was spectacular. You must come for this experience and request Fariz!

title: Exceptional  service
text: Our waiter Fariz made our whole experience. 5 stars isn’t enough! What a beautiful hotel and the tea and food was delicious. It is like a fairytale. The tropical tea was excellent and the Eloise tea for kids couldn’t be more precious

title: Tea at the plaza
text: I had tea recently with family at the plaza and we were served by a wonderful man named Fariz Tello who made our experience magical. He was attentive, kind, and so patient with my two little cousins who shared the Eloise Special. Thank you Fariz for such a memorable experience and going above and beyond!

title: Fariz is elite
text: My wife and I went for tea at The Palm Court. This was our second time going there as a couple, fantastic way to spend a morning in NYC. Fariz was our server and he is fantastic, pls ask for him when you go.

title: Amazing!!
text:
Fariz is the most amazing person.
He made our experience at The Palm at the Plaza Hotel an unforgettable one.

Thank you Fariz for being an exceptional human being. Amazing amazing!
Richard and Alicia ❤️

title: Christmas Tea at the Plaza
text: It’s everything you’ve ever heard of; it’s everything you can possibly imagine it to be. Exquisite and delightful food, doting and attentive service. Our server, a wonderful gentleman named Fariz, charmed both my mother and my wife and showered us with attentive service. It was an incredible experience.

title: Afternoon tea
text:
Fariz Tello is the absolute BEST and was a wonderful part of our experience. The ambiance and tea was exquisite.
The Eloise Tea is perfect for any child. The staff catered to my Granddaughter. 
Thank you!!
Tami

title: Amazing Historic Property
text: Was upgraded to a Junior Suite during my stay in this iconic hotel that didn't disappoint. Rooms were well appointed, the bathroom marble and gold-plated faucets were beautiful. Would recommended this hotel for anyone coming to New York and looking for a bit of luxury and historic charm. The hotel location, across the street from central park is perfect for anyone whishing to escape the hustle and bustle of the city. Hoping to return soon.

title: Christmas at The Plaza
text: Shalim made our experience so magical at our first visit for afternoon tea at The Palm. He was prompt, kind, welcoming and inviting. We will surely be back! Thank you Shalim and all the staff of The Palm Court and The Plaza!

title: We love the Plaza!
text: My boyfriend and I had afternoon tea at the Plaza, it was his first time and we both had an amazing experience. Our server was Fariz and he was exceptional! He made the experience unforgettable. We can’t wait to return!

title: Wonderful experience, wonderful service
text: Fariz, our server,  was exceptionally attentive and immediately brought us a vegan menu when he learned of my dairy allergy. The vegan selection was lovely and delicious. Highly recommend tea service ! The atmosphere was beautiful.

title: Friendly service!
text: Shamim Khan and all the servers and hosts working on 12/6 in Palm Court were so kind, generous, and accommodating! As a solo traveler, the engaging conversations I have with staff mean the world to me!

title: Afternoon tea with Eloise
text: Afternoon tea at the plaza is wonderful and we enjoyed the treats and drinks. Fariz gave us wonderful service, was attentive and kind and made it a memorable experience. He made sure to make it fun for me as I loved Eloise as a child and he surprised me with an Eloise tea cup and teapot! It was so nice and he definitely went the extra mile to make it special. I will definitely be back!

title: Would give 10 stars!
text: 5/5! We had a family afternoon tea on Monday 5th December and we had Kazi Jahal as our palm court server. He is such a true gentleman and was the perfect host. He kept our little boy entertained  and was very attentive with his service. If we could give 10 stars we would

title: Pre holiday tea
text: The Palm Court for tea was a delight. Our server Farize T was a delight. He recommended great options from the menu. The menu selection for the holiday season was delicious. Farize was attentive with us and the table next to us. He was knowledgeable, personable and accommodating. Presently the holiday decor in the hotel is festive and beautiful.  Make reservations!

title: Afternoon tea
text: Wonderful afternoon tea with family. Our server Shalim Khan was very helpful and kind. The food was delicious. The vegan tea option was delicious.  The ambiance is very grand and the decorations perfect.

title: Annual Cousin's Christmas at The Plaza !
text:
Every Christmas for the past 20 years I've visited The Plaza . 

Firstly, The Champagne Bar . I'm very happy it's open once again to the public . Larry Gobin is always so wonderful and we had an amazing bartender as well. I will say to Mr. Romaniello the new general manager , that I think removing the champagne from the bar was a mistake . The decor is not what that bar is about . Just look at the movie Christmas at The Plaza ! 

Next up was The Palm Room yo visit our favorite bartender Laura  Royer. The whole staff remembers us year to year . The service is outstanding beyond words . 

The new trees are beautiful. I'm torn however because the prior years the ornaments on the trees are classic  "Plaza".

Thank you for another year of beautiful memories .

title: They ruined The Plaza
text: Unfortunately, the rooms no longer offer Central Park views as they did 10 years ago. I guess they thought condominiums would be a better profit in the long run? Doesn't make any sense to me. It lost its charm.

title: The Plaza is lucky to have Farez!
text: Farez is an absolute treat and made it the most incredible experience! Always a lovely experience at the Plaza because of him! The champagne, tea and treats were a delight. Such a wonderful start to the holiday season!

title: Shoutout to the staff at Champagne Bar - December Birthday Celebration
text: A friend and I stopped by the the Champagne Bar for a drink with friends who were staying at The Plaza. We were all celebrating our birthdays. Narendra Nathani, our server, was not only professional and welcoming, but he went above and beyond to make sure our time there was one that we would remember. His attention to the little things was what stood out the most. Walid Ghazal is another employee we had contact with.  He was very attentive and accommodating to our needs and requests. What I was impressed by the most was how genuine Walid was. This came across in a couple of instances and did not go unnoticed.  Lastly, our bartender Shaun was wonderful. He made sure to keep our glasses full and snap a few photos. We thoroughly enjoyed the beautiful surroundings, the Christmas atmosphere and our drinks. Looking forward to our next visit.

title: A must To-Do
text:
Afternoon yea surpassed ever y expectations we had. Fraud was an amazing server/host! 

A must to do — even when a local New Yorker 

I lived in London and truly adore afternoon teas, and The Plaza  an amazing job keeping the best tradition alive !

title: Tea at Palm Court, The Plaza
text: Faris Tello was exceptional. We loved the experience. The sampling was wonderful and each was more delish than the other. Thank you so much.   Faris was so kind and personable. Will request him when we return.

title: Afternoon Tea at the Palm Court, Plaza Hotel
text: Absolutely lovely experience!  Delicious food and exceptional service!  Fariz was our waiter and he went out of his way to ensure that we had a memorable experience!  Thank you Fariz! Great time and place!

title: Tea at Palm Court | The Plaza
text: Our server Fariz made our experience perfect and the tea and food was outstanding. Advance reservation needed and plan to spend 2 hours.  Incredible for adults and children.  And extra special during the holidays!!!!!

title: Brilliant tea.
text:
The whole experience of tea at the Plaza is incredible. Such luxury, great food, brilliant service especially by Fariz Tello and opulent surroundings. The Christmas decorations in the hotel are spectacular. 
A great start to the Christmas season.

title: Tea time at its finest
text: Fariz was a perfect gentleman. He was pleasant and professional and livened our afternoon tea experience to a new level.  The Plaza signature tea has everything you need.  Chai imperial tea is lovely, the pastrami finger sandwich and cucumber with labneh are faves.

title: Disappointing 😞
text:
Called in Saturday evening for cocktails with my mam and sister. Seems like alot of the frills have gone from the drinks presentation since we last visit while prices have gone up. We were in the city for the weekend from Dublin Ireland and the plaza was a little treat, or it was until someone kicked off screaming homophobic and racial slurs at staff and customers. I understand that these horrible people exist unfortunately but it could have been dealt with more swiftly than it was as it last 30 mins and children present. Call the police, have more security,  something. 
Then was no apology to anyone after it was finished. 
Unfortunately I'll always remember my visit, but for some wrong reasons

title: Amazing!!!
text: Me and my wife went for afternoon tea at the plaza. It was absolutely fantastic, the food was lovely and we were greeted to some champagne when we were shown to our seats. The waiter that served us was Fariz and he was amazing for the whole time we were there. He really made it a great and fun experience for us

title: Fantastic New York City experience!
text: Fantastic afternoon tea with incredible ambiance. The tea was very well made and the meal options were delightful. A little on the higher end, price-wise, but considering the atmosphere and experience it’s definitely worth it. Fariz Tello was our Palm Court Server and he was fantastic, extremely attentive and polite. He ensured that our experience exceeded our expectations.

title: 10 out of 10
text:
Very good food and excellent service from Mr Fariz.
The teatime is excellent, the food was delicious, I was here with my parents and I hope to do this again and again.
I wish I have seen Kevin ha ha ha.

title: Plaza Tea at The Palm Court
text: Fariz gives an excellent service! He was so kind and thoughtful and made our afternoon tea one to remember! He made our birthday girl for her 6th birthday feel extra special! We’ve been coming for years and it this trip to The Plaza was exceptional. Thank you Fariz!

title: Breakfast at the Plaza
text:
Brilliant breakfast experience at the Plaza.
Food was Devine and our server Stanley gave us the best service and a VIP experience. 

Lovely atmosphere and beautiful surroundings to have breakfast in at NYC!

All the team were very friendly and professional, nothing was too much trouble!

title: Champagne in the Plaza ❤️
text: We went to the plaza to fulfil a life dream of having Champagne in The Plaza. Our sever Alam was fabulous, really made our visit special, never an empty glass. The setting was gorgeous and really made our trip to New York super special with my mum and sister. Alam thank you for making our evening special, look forward to seeing you in the Future x

title: Good stay
text: The hotel was beautiful and the service was great. The Champagne Bar was a nice place to relax after a day of sight seeing. The room was clean and the bathroom was large. Loved the holiday decorations. The only thing I wished they had was a ATM machine.

title: Yea at the plaza- Shalim was great!
text: Shalim was our server for tea at the plaza and he was fabulous! Everyone made our experience special, Shalim was kind & attentive & we’re excited to come visit again! Thank you to the Plaza for making our family tea time memorable. Ask for Shalim next time you visit

title: Awesome
text: Fariz is the man. We had a great time!, it was so much fun and an awesome experience. The customer service was amazing and we’ll come back every year. Such a cool deal to do for the Christmas and thanksgiving.

title: Mother/Daughter Tea - Memories to be Treasured
text: The Palm Court Tea and our Server (Kazi) were fantastic. The beautiful decorations, tea and pleasant and efficient server and staff were well worth the trip. My daughter and I will treasure this treat long after the leftovers are gone.

title: Champagne bar - romantic date nights
text: The champagne bar is one of our favorite spots in NYC. For our fifth anniversary we started our evening at the champagne bar before heading to our dinner reservation. The champagne list, cocktails, and bites are always excellent and the service is second to none. For this most recent visit, we were served by Nick, who has served us in the past as well. We had such a great time and conversation with Nick while we were there. The atmosphere is amazing, especially as they have started to decorate for the holidays. It is a truly New York experience and we can't say enough about the staff. If you are staying at the Plaza, do not miss the opportunity to have a drink here.

title: Tea at the Plaza
text: What a lovely experience and an amazing way to celebrate my nieces 10th birthday. Kazi was the most excellent host and went above and beyond to make a special day even better! The extra touches of chocolate were delicious. He is the best!

title: Tea at the plaza
text: Tea at the plaza certainly exceeded our expectations.  Our trip to New York was a family occasion celebrating many significant birthdays.  Our host served us with kindness, care and such great attention.  He made us feel very special and valued guests.  We had stated on our booking that we were celebrating birthdays and he kindly gave us gifts which we will treasure forever.  Although I can’t remember his name we will always remember his kindness and great service.

title: Fariz made high tea a delight!
text: Our waiter, Fariz, was such a delight. Truly so welcoming and warming and completely made our high tea experience memorable and special. He took the time to go the extra mile with everything he did. Such a class act and an enjoyable experience! Couldn’t recommend more.

title: High Tea at the Plaza Hotel
text: The high tea was a dream! Ask for Kazi as your server. He truly made the experience. He made us a special blend of tea, and it was delicious. We tried three different options for the sweet and savory bites and really enjoyed all three.

title: Great experience
text: Fabulous!! Top notch experience and dining. Wonderful service, I would recommend highly. Our third experience here and will be returning next time in New York.will be anticipating that trip back to the Plaza as soon as we can get back to New York.

title: Afternoon tea at the Plaza
text:
This was an excellent way to spend an hour mid afternoon. Some champagne and some light bites. The afternoon tea menu is really lovely but of course, it’s not for the hungriest of folks. 
The staff here are excellent, they simply can’t do enough for you.
We booked in advance and given how busy it was , I’m sure we made the right guy choice.

title: Great service
text: Five stars for our dinner at the plaza hotel in the champagne room. Aside from the amazing ambience & delicious food, Nick was so great! He was such a pleasure & made dinner so enjoyable because of his great service. He provided top service :)

title: Amazing service and experience
text: Nick was the absolute best! He was so warm and friendly and we enjoyed our experience at The Plaza so much because of him. He was so helpful with suggestions and recommendations. We will definitely be back soon!

title: Amazing high tea experience at the Plaza!
text:
Enjoyed our time at the Plaza. Kazi made our time very special here. 

Ordered the vegan and veg options for high tea.  Enjoyed majority of the items.  The savory items were my favorite. 

Will definitely be back soon!

title: Kazi was great!
text: Kazi was exceptional, wonderful service. Made our experience so lovely! The food and ambience exceeded expectations, and everyone enjoyed the time. Kazi even took pictures for us at different locations, and went above and beyond to add to our experience. Will be back!

title: Brunch
text: Food was amazing!! Our server Fariz Tello was over the moon fabulous!!! He moved mountains and made us feel like we were the the only ones here!! He made my 2 year old niece feel so special and brought her lots of little gifts all throughout the meal. We will absolutely be back! Please ask for Fariz to be your server you won’t regret it!!!

title: Tea at Palm Court
text: Wonderful setting, great food and tea. Great options for kids, we each had our own selection to choose from. The service is fantastic, especially our server Fariz, he was especially attentive to any requests!

title: A Manhattan Must!
text: Highly recommend the champagne Bar.  Classic jazz in the background and classic drinks on the menu.  Ask for Nick’s table.  And while it’s a “Champagne Bar”, every classic cocktail is available, too.  Great fun!

title: Tea with Eloise
text: Amazing, experience of a lifetime. Excellent food, service and hospitality. Al the staff are so kind and accommodating. We were a large party with a lot of food allergies and they took care of us expertly, every step of the way, from reservation desk staff, hostesses and wait staff. Kazi was so attentive and created a such a memorable experience for us. We met newly hired Hoque, he was so gracious and efficient . Seemed like he had been working at the Plaza for ages. Also have to mention the doorman Anthony who went out of his way to assist us. It was a very lovely afternoon.

title: Iconic
text: Great Iconic hotel. Champagne Bar and palm court are great places to enjoy Drinks , lunch or Tea. Concierge “ Julia” is one of the best in NYC.  Sadly no more shops open in the basement . The Champagne Bar staff is the greatest.  Larry and Invitza will do anything to make sure your enjoying your moment .

title: Tea at the plaza
text: We enjoyed our stay at the plaza and decided to have high tea. Our waiter Fraiz was wonderful, and very accommodating ! We brought our girls and they  loved the Eloise’s tea! I do wish there were more options because they are very picky.  Maybe a cheese sandwich option.

title: Awesome birthday celebration!
text:
We were in NYC to celebrate our birthdays...I'd had afternoon tea 40 years ago here and decided to do it again as I wanted to go somewhere special to celebrate. It was glorious! The staff was amazing, starting with the hostesses who welcomed us so warmly. Shalim was our server assisted by Stanley. They were awesome! We had afternoon tea with champagne...it was so delicious..little sandwiches, pastries and my favorite, scones with cream and strawberry jam..OMG...everything- little pieces of art...check out their tea menus. We couldn't eat it all but they are happy to box it up. Shalim and Stanley even sang happy birthday to me!
I can't tell you how happy I was ...the setting is so beautiful, the service and food and drink outstanding. I'm planning on making this an annual tradition!
Well worth the price...you only live once 😊

title: good stay but wrong bills
text: the stay was great, they upgraded me to a bigger room but the hotel somehow mysteriously charged me 57.71USD more for "refreshment center" consumption which I have absolutely no idea what it is, don't even know where the "refreshment center" is!!

title: Afternoon Tea at the Palm Court
text: My friend and I made reservations to have the afternoon tea at the Palm Court. Everything was truly delicious. Our server was Fariz and he made our experience even more memorable with all the attentions and wonderful service. We highly recommend this experience and would love to come back!

title: Plaza what an experience
text: Nick Nathaniel at the champagne bar was fabulous. The plaza is the best place to enjoy an afternoon with friends. But ask for Nick what a joy!  The old fashions were wonderful and the atmosphere was an enjoyable. What can I say ask for Nick he is absolutely the best.

title: My second trip...awesome again!
text: I had a great visit. The service was great. The room was amazing. The people were very nice. I can't wait to go there again. This was my second visit to the hotel and it was just as good and even better than the first. Like I said, another visit will be on the way in the future!

title: Lovely experience
text: We were here to celebrate a birthday and choose Afternoon Tea for the occasion. The afternoon tea was amazing and the service was excellent. Our server Shalim was attentive, service-minded and made sure our experience at the Palm Court was unforgettable☺️

title: Amazing afternoon tea experience
text:
Excellent service from Fariz. 
The afternoon tea food is surprisingly very filling! Everything was delicious and beautifully prepared. 
Highly recommend for a date or celebration or get together with friends.

title: Great hotel but some issues
text: The hotel is very good. Room is spacious (821) and comfortable. The staff has been very professional and pleasant. The only reason I do not give this hotel a 5 star review is due to the issue of their private events taking up the amenities of the hotel. One of the things I personally enjoy the most when traveling and the reason why I select a good 5 star hotel is to enjoy the lobby, bar, amenities and enjoy myself in the property where I’m staying. The Plaza has a nice bar area which is the Palm Court but unfortunately we have only been able to enjoy it once. The first night they closed early for a celebration and the third night closed for a wedding. They should have designated ballrooms and areas for private events that do not interfere with the hotel guests. We had to leave our hotel to have some drinks before dinner which for that I would stayed at a 3 star hotel. Very inconvenient. If I ever stay here again I would check what dates they have events or avoid weekends altogether.

title: Outstanding food and service!
text: We ate at the Champagne Bar at the Plaza tonight. Nick Nathani was our server and helped ensure we had a great time. The Plaza is a wonderful representation of old New York. We will definitely come back.

title: Tea at Palm Court
text: We had tea at Palm Court and it was a fantastic experience. Fariz was a phenomenal waiter and willing to guide a group who hadn’t had much afternoon tea before. We would definitely come back. On top of all the great things, we got a birthday celebration complete with a candle and macaroons.

title: Oasis amidst bustling NYC
text: Wonderful group experience! Delicious tea and food offerings. Fariz and staff did a great job. They catered to our younger ones beautifully. No detail was overlooked! We thoroughly enjoyed our time!!!

title: Eloise Was Right!
text:
If you're not familiar with the Eloise books, I apologize. They're classics. So is the Plaza Hotel, where she lives. She only elementary-school-aged, but she speaks for my husband and me when she exclaims how much she LOVES the Plaza.
There's a lot to love here.
I've visited the Plaza before, for tea at the Palm Court, but this was the first time we stayed there. It was perfect. Our room, a Delxe King, was spacious, with a very comfortable bed, plenty of storage space, and excellent amenities.
The bathroom was likewise spacious and well-supplied with amenities. My favorite feature was a HUGE bathtub (One of my favorite things). Two people could've fit into it comfortably and been up to their shoulders in the water. Luxury!
Excellent Wi-Fi.
As for the folks working there, everyone was wonderful, from check-in to check-out. We felt truly welcomed, not lip-service welcomed. Housekeeping did an excellent job.
We had a tasty breakfast in the Palm Court with superb service.
Now that we know, we want to return.
Okay, I admit that, like Eloise, I'd love to live there, too.

title: The Plaza Hotel is my home away from home.
text:
The hotel staff is BEYOND incredible. They’re a great part of why I keep coming back. 
When you get to the champagne bar, ask for Nick, Rahman, Farid or Mr. Bancea. They will treat you like royalty. 

Special thank you to Russel for providing such amazing room accommodations. He is such a sweetheart! 

Reza is the sweetest and most attentive butler you will have during your stay. 

Ana Cristina at the Guerlain Spa has magic hands.

Thank you for making my 30th birthday one I’ll treasure forever!!!

title: Amazing Service & Experience at The Plaza’s Champagne Bar!
text: On a recent trip to NYC I had the pleasure of staying at The Plaza and entertaining in the Champagne Bar. Our server Nick Nathani was out of this world!  I’ve been staying at the hotel for over 20 years and have to say it was the best service I have ever experienced at the hotel. Nick made me and our guests feel so welcome in a warm and welcoming way that was just the right amount of humor, warmth and caring making sure we had a magical experience. Thank you to Nick and The Plaza Champagne Bar team. You are all out of this world!!!  Can’t wait to come back and see you all.

title: High Tea is wonderful, bathrooms are disgusting.
text:
We enjoyed high tea at the Plaza today.  It was wonderful and exactly what you would expect of a high tea. Elegant and graceful.
But we went to use the ladies room twice while we were there and both times it was disgustingly dirt.  No toilet paper, no paper towels, trash on the floor.  Reminded us of a gas station bathroom.  It was gross.  Sad that this premier hotel would allow this to happen.

title: Afternoon Tea at the Plaza
text: Great experience - personalized, tasty and high end. Shalim was attentive and friendly. I would recommend to any visitor looking for a true NYC experience! Multiple tea options and the food bites were yummy and filling.

title: terrible customer service!!
text:
DO Not stay here!!!!! we showed up at 9:30am
and they sent us to a room with no electricity! when they then switched us they downgraded our room and we spent 30 min wasting it when we should have been asleep! the people at the desk and the manager were AWFUL!! so rude! did not want to help at all! they were condescending and arrogant!!

title: Birthday celebration
text: We had an amazing afternoon in the palm court, the plaza. We were served by Mr. Fariz, an excellent person, very humble. We would love to come back again. Thank you for a lovely experience! :) Must try

title: Tea time
text: Thanks Fariz for a wonderful tea at the Palm Court! We had a great girls day. Beautiful scenery, delicious pastries, fabulous champagne, excellent service. 10/10 would recommend. Everyone should do this at least once.

title: Excellent Service (via Fariz and The Plaza)
text: Fariz was very welcoming and we all enjoyed having him as a server. He was honestly a huge part of our experience since we don’t live in New York and are only here for a few days. He was so kind and catering to our table.

title: Outstanding Palm Court Server!!
text: Fariz Tello was an excellent server! He was very patient with our questions and explained everything on the menu perfectly. He was friendly and polite as well, definitely made the experience having afternoon tea so much better!

title: Lovely moments with friends
text: Fariz T. Made our afternoon tea absolutely lovely!  He is so warm and welcoming.  Beautiful display of yummy bites inside an elegant setting.  Couldn’t have asked for a more special occasion and way to spend time with my girlfriends.

title: Amazing afternoon tea
text: We had a fantastic afternoon tea at the Plaza. One of the best things to do in NYC. Special thanks to Fariz for the incredible service and the lovely gifts for the boys. We will be back next time……..!

title: I can Only Give Five STARS id give them more
text:
From the moment we arrived we were made to feel special. We were met by the door man who insisted on helping us. As a visitor for the first time we were surprised at the help was given straight away? (I shouldn’t have as it kept going). We were escorted to the reception and met Gary who again welcomed us to the Plaza Hotel and made us feel special. Told us the our baggage would be carried to the room for us.  Paul (again a smile and a conversation) kindly took us to our room and before leaving showed us around our room. To say we were blown away at our room would be an understatement. It was fabulous!!!!!  We were just settling in to the unpacking before going out when tap on the door.  A maid had turned up to Turn down the bed and close the blinds for us (Wow I’m now feeling really Posh but I’m not honest).  The maid asked us if everything was ok and if we needed anything please ask.

On the Sunday of our visit we had the privilege of the afternoon tea.  Again I will say this is a must even if you just visit New York book it.  The room was beautiful and the staff were excellent and helpful. It is a treat so be prepared to pay what you would expect from an exceptional hotel.

I must mention the concierge as they too very helpful. They permitted my wife to charge her phone while we went to the afternoon tea. A simple request met with no fuss.

As we left again the Doormen were exceptional and could see we were concerned about our booked car. He calmly reassured my wife we can sort something out and she was not to worry. Thankfully it arrived and again carried our luggage to the car for us.

This is why I’m sorry I can only give five stars because I can’t give any more because I would. This hotel is a once in a lifetime place to stay and if you save (as we did) you will get this amazing opportunity.

title: The Plaza is a nightmare, Luigi Romanelli we need to talk desperately!
text: I am trapped in a nightmare - Cancelled reservation upon arrival, $30,000 in charges here less then 24 hours, incompetent basic service, terribly undermanned - It’s so sad!! This used to be an amazing place - now it’s a Hilton express service provider  operating in the the oldest once greatest hotel in America,

title: INITIAL VISIT TO PLAZA HOTEL
text: Previously stated above.  No further comments to offer at this present time.  We have been extremely complimentary of both the Plaza  Hotel and the staff members. The orchard displays all around the lobby area and especially the center piece in the main lobby area were exquisite.

title: Afternoon Tea in the Plaza NY.
text: We went to the Plaza for afternoon tea to celebrate my wife's 60th birthday. We'd travelled to New York from Belfast for 5 nights and on our last day we went to the Plaza.  What an experience, our server's name is Fariz Tello, what a really lovely man he is, he made our visit feel really special,  he brought my wife the most beautiful chocolates in a tin box for her to keep, he also brought us Plaza post cards and pens for us to fill in and send back home to our families and friends and the Plaza covered the postage. We thought this was a really nice thing to finish off our stay in New York.  Afternoon Tea is not cheap but you know what to expect before you go, the whole experience was worth every $. Thanks again to Fariz, you really made our day.

title: A tea to remember
text: Fariz treated us like queens. He made the event a tea to remember. These kinds of memories always bring a smile. 😄😃😀😆😁 ☕️ 🫖 now they’ve insisted I add on to this review so I will talk about the gorgeous room and the Eloise books and painting.

title: Go for the tea service, come back for Fariz.
text:
Yes, it’s lovely and the food is fine and the tea selection excellent. 
Holy smokes! The absolute highlight was our server Fariz. It is so obvious he loves his work. He made each and every guest feel like the center of the universe. Little girls, friend groups. Taking pictures, charging phones, smiling effervescently. 
What a pleasure to see a consummate professional. 
Made our day.

title: Oct drinks and apps
text:
Service above and beyond.   Went in with high expectations and they were exceeded. 

As an aside - the food was also great

Ivica and his team made this a memorable evening.

Just did drinks and apps and not dinner - will always do come back when in town.

title: Excellent service
text: Fariz was very very hospitable and knew how to deal with our little kids! He was able to accommodate their food restrictions and was ver nice with all of us. The Plaza atmosphere is very elegant and special

title: Excellent
text: Amazing food and service. Everything was fresh and tasty. Fariz Tello was our server. He was attentive and kind, and made sure we had a great visit all throughout. Would recommend visiting with anyone!

title: Birthday Trip with Mom
text: Wonderful service (complete with arranging chair to make sure we had the best picture to commemorate the occasion), great food and drink, and amazing ambience.  The price is worth the experience. We had that Manhattan Tea and it was fantastic.

title: Afternoon Tea at the Palm Court, NYC Plaza Hotel
text: Our server, Fariz Tello was beyond magnificent. My daughter and i went for tea for my birthday. It was our first time doing this in NYC, to which we visit at least twice a year. Mr. Tello treated us like royalty. And when I told him my childhood love of Eloise, he changed everything at our table to Eloise. It just made my day.  Then he brought out a special birthday platter at the end. He made it a day I will always remember and so special. If you’re going for tea at The Plaza….ask for Mr. Tello.  You won’t be disappointed.

title: Afternoon Tea at The Plaza
text: The Afternoon Tea at the Palm Court within the Plaza was absolutely spectacular! Porfirio was our server, and he was fabulous. So attentive and made sure my niece felt included! Just wonderful! Teas were delightful, and everything on the menu was so special.  Thank you Porfirio for taking such great care of us!

title: Afternoon tea at Palm Court, Plaza Hotel
text: The best experience at afternoon tea at the Palm Court, Plaza Hotel today. Fariz was our wonderful waiter. Truthfully, he made the experience! We went for my sisters birthday and he made such a fuss of us. Stunning day with stunning food, and even better service! Worth every penny!

title: Outstanding experience. Second to none.
text: I proposed to my now fiancé at the Palm Court. We actually met at the Plaza Hotel. Fariz was our server and was so kind to us, on our special day. Nothing compares. Just outstanding. We will certainly return.

title: Superb visit and we loved Shalim
text: We enjoyed a lovely tea today. The atmosphere was beautiful and relaxing and our server was superb. He made our visit extra special, even going so far as to show us how jasmine tea is made. Shalim Khan, thank you so much for your kindness and going out of your way for us!

title: Tea of a Lifetime
text: Fariz was excellent. So patient, explained everything. Food was a surprise in every bite. We would recommend it to all who visit New York City. A highlight of our girls trip. Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you. From the Cosmos Girls Poker Group.

title: Serviço perfeito
text: Fomos muito bem atendidos por todos do hotel principalmente pela atendente Juciana, como estávamos com nosso bebê ela nos deu uma atenção super especial. A localização do hotel é a melhor de NY conseguimos fazer todos os programas a pé sem precisar pegar nenhum táxi ou metro. Recomendamos muito a estadia aqui.

title: Jessica’s 21st Birthday Treat
text: What can I say but this experience was such a disappointment, the doorman who greeted us were lovely and approachable(even posing for a photo) and once inside the glorious building the surroundings were magnificent. We arrived in plenty of time for our Afternoon Tea and was asked to go for a walk(15mins early) which we did only around the hotel lobby and came back at 1pm and were left standing whilst they seated other people who had arrived after us. The waiter we eventually got was to say the least miserable and we asked if we could change the ingredients of some of the sandwiches, but we were told no as everything was pre done and there was no other option but to have what was on offer. Another waiter came over and asked if we would like some water, we asked for still water and it cost us on the bill $12.00. The two teapots came out and the tea was very weak. Then they brought us our selection of sandwiches and miniature desserts, we ate three of the sandwiches and left the rest. As it was my daughter’s 21st we ordered two cocktails (costing $52.00). The only nice thing was when they presented my daughter with a birthday plate which had a small tin with a salted caramel brownie inside and macarons as decorations. I spoke to an employee who asked about our day and even he was shocked that we were not able to change our sandwiches the whole bill came to a staggering price of £358.00 yes I know it’s a lot but don’t think we would ever go or recommend to anyone. Best place for great for at great prices and a fabulous atmosphere go to grand central station food hall.

title: Champagne bar server
text: Nick Nathani is extremely pleasant and was so helpful!  My husband and I had a fantastic time at, The Plaza, as Nick made our visit memorable.  I would recommend Nick anytime and am thankful that we met him.  My husband and I enjoyed our stay and would come back because of the experience we had with Nick.

title: Lovely as always
text: A highlight stop every time I am in nyc. Nick at the champagne bar was amazing!!! Definitely the best place for a Manhattan and of course the building is stunning. Great vibes and good food too:). Thanks Nick!

title: The best there is.
text: If you’re reviewing 5 star hotels in Manhattan just stop and book this hotel. We all know the location is prime but it’s the attentiveness to detail and the friendliness of the staff that makes it 5 star. Repeat guests are truly treated like family.

title: The Plaza
text: The service at the Plaza is amazing! Nick had great customer service. Very friendly, positive, and attended to us very well. The atmosphere was very calming with lovely classic music.  I enjoyed the evening and will be coming back.

title: Pesima experiencia
text:
La magia del hotel desapareció. 0 servicio. Te cobran hasta por el internet en tu habitacion. Espejos con moho. Baño de lobby (el que esta detras del bar, mas sucio que el publico de central park) miradas agresivas del staff y 0 colaboracion ante consultas por comida kosher en el area.
Realmente vergonzoso lo que han convertido al hermoso plaza hotel. 
Pd: si cobras media estadia por 4 horas de late check out al menos ten el decoro de informar a las otras areas, cada 15 min venian a desalojarme teniendo que explicar que HABIA pagado.

title: Best experience
text: We had the best experience at the champagne room! Nick was our server! Going in for one drink turned into an afternoon of fun! Visit you won’t be disappointed!!! The plaza and nick are an amazing experience

title: Champagne Bar
text: Our waiter, Nick, was the best!!!! It was our first time at the plaza and  He helped us pick the best Champagne! Ask for nick when you come, you won’t regret it! 10/10 experience. Champagne bar-the best!

title: Don’t get fooled by the “ Partial View”
text:
There are dreamy places that you see on TV, but when you get there your bubble burst. There is no doubt this hotel is a signature place in New York but I guess only in name, but not so much quality. $7 K for 2 nights at the only “partial park view suites” at Carnegie Suites you can see on pictures what is the view I got! 
Truly bummed by the view, then it comes to customer service, at the time of booking I asked for a roll over bed. 2 days before arrival I received a call to confirmed my pre-paid arrival and again I confirmed the bed, At the time of checking at the reception for the 3rd time I confirmed it and still waiting 2 hours for our room to get ready, guess what!!! The bed was not there! This is bad customer service. 

The quality of food in room service is average and with so many choices in New York won’t be an issue. 

Save yourself money and don’t get fooled by “partial park view” you will wake up next building windows!

title: Tired and expensive
text:
The rooms are getting really tired. Nails sticking out of units, wonky cupboards and drawers, deeply stained carpets. No amenities, tea or coffee and room service so slow impossible. Very rude when calling room service, no  mini bar change / check, no ice, ad hoc turn down. 
The location combined with how tired the hotel with the extortionate pricing just don’t make this place worth it. All name and no substance. The only good thing is the concierge.

title: Tea at the plaza
text:
Lovely experience. A great way to spend an afternoon with the family. Followed by a nice walk in Central Park. 
Beautiful room, sandwiches and good service from Shalim Khan. Remember to wear your finest attire.

title: Wonderful stay at The Plaza that lives up to its name.
text: We had a wonderful stay at The Plaza and the property lives up to its name. The rooms were large and impeccably decorated in great condition. The bathroom was very spacious with beautiful mosaic tiles and amenities with the most amazing shower. The staff in the hotel were polite and gave such a warm welcome not only on arrival but every time you walked past. The beds were comfortable but are showing their age as they are starting to sag and this is the only improvement I could see during my stay. The restaurant is pricy but this is to be expected and the service once again is impeccable. Do yourself a favor and don’t hesitate to book a stay at this hotel. It’s very hard to be disappointed.

title: Special birthday treat holiday
text: Well…. I wish I could say the experience was wonderful, it wasn’t. Check in was more concerned about registration of $250 a day for length of stay. When my bank in UK quite rightly stopped the transaction thinking it was a security breach it caused issue at the desk. From that point on we were not given ANY information of the daily standard charges or  facilities offered at the hotel not even Wi-Fi code. We had to go back to check in to request the code and only then did I get a stream of messages from my bank to alert of a possible theft/security breach of my card (thank you First Direct for being on the ball )Had we had the code and other information I would have been able to authorise the registration of funds but hey ho we were very royally dismissed with nothing more than…… we could have room service or access the restaurant 24hrs a day. Only the staff who cleaned our rooms were more than helpful and extremely pleasant/friendly. Door staff ignored us preferring to speak to Gucci clad individuals, the check in clerk ignored me in the lift and continued to talk to another guest. We questioned by restaurant staff when we enquired about a table, being told we had to be resident at the hotel, WE WERE! I’m not an urgent unintelligent individual, I am smartly dressed,I I know how to conduct myself. However it would seem The Plaza are only interested in the show of money, not in substance of what we MAY have. Plaza? Your attitude on what was a “special “ trip was marred by your blinkered and short sightedness.

title: Terrible Service
text:
Terrible Service - A glass of Champagne at the bar, the waiter was arguing with a colleague in front of us, we struggled to get his attention, overall a poor experience. The building is absolutely beautiful so that’s the one bonus. 

We did contemplate staying for another glass of champagne but decided there are far better places in New York.

title: Love it. Cheers
text: I arrived and the service at the desk perfect. But most charming experience as a solo woman was at the bar with the delightful Shaun. Being here for a week I have felt so comfortable sitting alone and entertained before I go for dinner and as importantly when I return. Shaun especially is a generous charming part of your plaza experience. The Plaza is old fashioned glam  which I adore.

title: Promises promises
text: I stayed in a one bedroom suite over Memorial Day weekend 2022. Check in took far longer than should have so they promised to take $300 off by bill and return it to my credit card on the condition that I had purchased the room through the Fairmont website and not a 3rd party. I did indeed book direct and have been waiting for the $300 refund all summer and it hasn't been done. I've called three times and left messages because nobody ever answers in the accounting department. Of course nobody has called me back. Don't stay here they are full of it and will tell you what you want to hear with no follow through.

title: US Open visit
text: We came back to The Plaza to see our most favorite server, Nick. He made our last visit in December so memorable! He remembered all of our favorite drinks and made us feel so welcome during an incredibly busy time. He gave us the same 5 star, amazing service on this visit and we’re looking forward to seeing him when we visit again in a few months. Nick is such an asset to The Plaza and we feel lucky to have met him!

title: Birthday Treat for 3 Sisters from The UK
text:
Fantastic Experience Start to Finish. 
Our Server Fariz, couldn’t do enough for us and was very accommodating. 
The atmosphere is so special and we can’t explain in words. 
A must for a special occasion in New York. 
We had the Signature Afternoon Tea and tried some new and fantastic flavours. 
Amazing Experience and we will be back

title: Brutal Stay
text:
Shocking!  This is the first review I’ve ever written in my life but felt the need.   We were here for a wedding.  It was beautiful.  The Hotel was the MOST disappointing stay we’ve ever had anywhere on the planet.  The service was brutal. The staff was unbelievably rude and that’s an understatement.  Not just 1 person either.  

There’s not even a coffee maker in the room.  At least he in room dining arrived quickly.  Thirty six dollars for coffee that tastes (I’m drinking one now) like dirty water.  The rooms are large by stale.  The carpets in the venues are old, filthy and tattered in places.  I could get into specifics but I don’t have the time.  

At least the location is second to none.  We were so excited to stay here. If there were negative stars I would give them a negative 5.  Im originally from NYC.  Such a disappointment.  We took over 100 rooms. Whomever owns this hotel needs a new manager.  NEVER AGAIN.

title: Tea with Fariz
text: We celebrated bridal gown shopping in NYC by starting our day with Tea at The Plaza! This is our second time having Fariz as our waiter and I can say without a doubt he is the ABSOLUTE BEST 🥰 He is so attentive, and always treats my daughter like a princess. We can’t wait to go back and will definitely request to be in his section. Thank you so so much Fariz!

title: High Tea at the Plaza
text: What an excellent experience. Truly unlike anything like it. NY classic with excellent service. Fariz guided us through the tasting with exceptional recommendations. A must do and can’t wait to do it again!

title: Great experience
text: We went there to have breakfast on two of my friends’ brithday. The service was impeccable, Fariz was super helpful and made sure we had everything we needed at all times. Because we were celebrating, he gave a tiny present to both of my friends. He really did help to make it a very nice start to their celebration.

title: Beautiful hotel
text: We called in for a glass of champagne after we had been round Central Park.  It is a beautiful hotel and we just wanted a glass of champagne as it was my birthday.  It is expensive, but so is everything in New York, and it is definitely well worth a visit,

title: Afternoon Tea at the Fairmont Plaza
text: My wife, my daughter and I spent a wonderful moment at the Palm Court. The high tea service was impeccable and delicious and our host, Fariz, was very nice and considerate. We will certainly come back!

title: Meh!
text: My wife and I went to The Plaza for afternoon tea to celebrate her 50th birthday. She has wanted to do this for years. It wasn't as amazing as I was expecting, it was ok, the staff where average, the tea itself was fine. I have had better in far less expensive hotels, but the good lady was very happy, so that's all that truly matters

title: Amazing Hotel and exceptional service
text:
We didn't stay here but visited because of the Home Alone movies. The hotel is stunning and the staff were so attentive, polite and happy!

We had a bottle of champagne in the bar area and the girls had ice cream. Was a great experience. Would definitely return but to stay as actual guests in the hotel. 
Brilliant service.

title: Tea at The Plaza
text: Fariz was simply wonderful! He took the time to get to know all of us and it was such a pleasure getting to know him. The next time my friends and I reunite for Tea at The Plaza, we will make sure to have Fariz on our team :)

title: Tea at The Plaza
text: I took my two 9 year old granddaughters to The Plaza for tea. Our waiter, Porfirio Cortes treated them like princesses. It will be a lifetime memory. The food was exceptional and the staff was very gracious

title: Iconic in every way
text: The Plaza is iconic in every way. Still, feels and presents as an  old school glamour hotel, which is ideal for some and dated for others.  Some rooms are smaller with limited views.  Plenty of tourists typically around the hotel.

title: Fariz is my new high tea guru!
text: What a wonderful experience Fariz provided for my birthday this month! He made us feel so welcome and celebrated, and he's so knowledgeable and kind. The ambiance was wonderful, and the birthday surprise was such a treat. I will return again!

title: Not what is seems
text:
Talk about Faded glory. This hotel has been so stripped back of its former opulence it is real hard to be impressed or excited about this once world class hotel. We booked a 3 night stay and were disappointed in so many ways. Good points: Room/bed/bathroom nice and comfortable but the repro furniture has a touch of English guest house about it. 
The hotel's overall offer to guests is now quite basic. There is hardly any real 5* luxury or exclusivity left in the place and exploring it takes about 5 minutes.
All of the main areas are now sparsely furnished or closed. 
There is a constant flow of tourists at the main entrance and lobby. And the Palm Court feels like a bus terminal with furniture that shows very visible signs of advanced wear. We ate there once and the food (basic burger/sandwich) was dreadful. Very poor quality.
There are no guest areas for sitting and relaxing and absolutely no fine dining or even decent dining facilities. 
To top it all the WiFi is not free in rooms, although ironically there is free WiFi in public areas. Can you explain the logic here?
Obviously it's location and history sells it without much effort, but otherwise it's not what you might expect.
To their credit the staff are lovely and very professional and are working hard with a product that is far from what it should be. 
We have visited NYC many times over years and were looking forward to experiencing the Plaza, but it has sadly been a poor experience.
Checking out tomorrow and won't be coming back.

title: Mother daughter return trip
text:
Love this hotel.  Had a great mother daughter time   Not our first time at the hotel and will not be our last time. Loved seeing familiar faces  
 It is like  coming home.  Everyone is so helpful and kind.  Always going above and beyond   Will be returning again and again

title: High Tea at the Plaza
text:
Our server was very efficient and cheerful.
Friendly enough, but stil professional.
His name is Fariz. He made my daughter’s Birthday ver special!
I highly recommend this experience if you are traveling to New York!!!!

title: High Tea at The Plaza
text: We had a lovely time celebrating my birthday at The Plaza. Everything was delicious and Fariz was a fabulous host! I highly recommend this experience to anyone traveling to NYC. Splurge and get the champagne. Totally worth it.

title: The absolute best
text: Everything is simply exceptional. Ask for Fariz as your server if he is there, he’s wonderful. If you’re celiac, the gluten free afternoon tea is magnificent and completely safe! And the tea selection is amazing!

title: Fariz was fantastic!!
text:
We had a fantastic time at The Plaza having afternoon tea in this iconic hotel.
Fariz was exceptionally attentive and has a very sophisticated air about him. Top class service, which complements the luxury hotel so well.
The food was exquisite and tea so flavoursome.
Thank you so much!

title: Well located
text: The stay was just average for me. All the greatness of the hotel that we had experienced in the past seemed to have past. The grand food court locate in the lower floor was gone, and, according to the employees, would not return. Some of the Concierge employees were less than helpful. As an example I decided to go to the Bronx Zoo. The Concierge suggested 3 different ways, bus, metro or taxi. I decided taxi due to the expediency. However, what the concierge failed to tell me that the Zoo was on a “free” day and had limited capacity and that capacity was normally filled by 9am. So, at 9:30am I spent $50. to take a taxi out to the zoo only to be told that the zoo was at capacity and closed to any additional visitors. I then spent additional time and money trying to use both the metro and taxi to return to the Plaza. One would think that in a 5 star hotel the Concierge team would be more aware of the different policies or hours of the various tourist attractions frequented by their quests.

title: Laura is the best!!!
text: Walked by many times, but never came in for a drink.  Finally stopped and got to experience Laura at The Plaza Hotel.  Immediately connected with her.  Even made a video for her on IG.  She’s too fun!  Must come by! She also introduced us to Jennifer who makes the most amazing deserts/pastries.  The macaroons were A-MAZ-ING!!!

title: The Plaza is an old Grande Dame showing her age
text:
The Plaza New York is an Old grande dame. She was gorgeous in her heyday but now she is old and falling apart. They have divided the hotel into the guest section and the resident section. This removed the grande large lobby from the guest side and check in is now squeezed over by the elevators. 
The guest rooms are old and falling apart. We stayed in 2 suites that connected and every room had draperies that were falling off hooks and missing darkening pull down shades. 
The bathroom amenities are full of toxins and fragrance. This hotel needs to renovate and modernize their rooms. 
It’s still a great location and the staff was amazing! I won’t stay here again as there are many other great hotels in New York.

title: Excellent stay with some minor issues
text: Check in was a breeze, and the guest relations manager met us and walked us up to our room. Our room was a classic Plaza King room, on the 10th floor facing the courtyard. The room itself was spacious and beautifully decorated. Amenities were lacking though; there was no luggage stand to place my carry-on, and no complimentary water bottles were provided until turndown service. On the last day, I asked for a late check out (1pm) which was granted. However, the housekeeping staff might not have been informed, as three different staff knocked on our door between 11-12:45pm, asking when we are checking out. Overall, we had a beautiful stay, but given that it was ‘The Plaza’, I felt that the kinks on service and amenities could have been avoided and be improved.

title: Exemplary service
text:
Such a fantastic afternoon at The Plaza yesterday enjoying an afternoon tea with my partner. 

From start to finish we had the most incredible service, especially from our server Fariz who was super friendly, knowledgeable and a credit to The Palm Court. 

The afternoon tea itself was absolutely delicious, beautifully presented and we would love to come back here soon

title: 5 days in NYC
text: Our first trip to NYC and we chose The Plaza because of its reputation and location. It really is a beautiful  hotel, close to everything we needed.  Our room was amazing, lots of space and every amenity we needed. The staff were incredible, very knowledgeable and helpful. We only ate and drank there on our last day, but I have to say the food, cocktails and service was top notch. Thank you all. We will be back one day.

title: INCREDIBLE EXPERIENCE
text: I live in Nyc and thought this would be a bit touristy, but it is truly an experience everyone should have. I went with my sister for my birthday and we had the best afternoon here! The food is actually incredible (and surprisingly filling) and the tea is fantastic and has the most beautiful aroma when you pour it. The BEST part though, was our server Fariz- you MUST ask for him if you come here!! 15/10 recommend!

title: Ask for Fariz
text: We had such an enjoyable time with my husband and my 1 year old. The tea and food were excellent. We definitely recommend the herbal teas. Fariz really took care of us and made sure it felt special. Thank you Fariz.

title: High Tea at The Plaza
text:
We celebrated my sisters 60th Birthday with high tea at Palm Court The Plaza. Our server Fariz Tello couldn’t do enough for us and made our experience one to remember   
I would recommend this experience to anyone visiting NYC💜

title: High Tea Extraordinaire
text: A truly wonderful experience having the high tea at the Park Plaza. The service could not have been better. Fariz who attended to us provided excellent service and the different savory and sweet assortment was a treat not to be missed. The tea variety was  exquisite.

title: Best High tea with best Host in NYC
text: We had the most delightful high tea experience at the Palm court in the Plaza Hotel.  Fariz was an extremely warm, pleasant and knowledgeable host.  He guided us thru our tea choices making sure we tried all the best flavors.  Highly recommend this experience for anyone visiting New York City!!

title: A wonderful afternoon teatime
text: Being in the Plaza Hotel was amazing, vegetarian afternoon teatime was perfect and Fariz, our waiter, was so nice and helpful. A great moment to live because everything was good, especially the sugar pièces!

title: Wonderful Afternoon Tea at the Palm Court
text: We had a fabulous afternoon tea service to celebrate a 25th birthday with family. Our waiter Fariz went above and beyond for us and made the occasion even more special. He was very knowledgeable about the tea selections and even brought out special chocolates as a gift for the birthday girl and others at the table. We have been to various teas around the city and this was our favorite experience by far! We will be back and be sure to request Fariz.

title: Superb Experience
text: Everything was top notch. Fairs made sure we were taken care of! the English breakfast tea was the highlight and the pastries added a nice touch. The atmosphere was splendid and brought us back to a better time
